apps.title: Deseret Bookshelf LDS Books
apps.description:
Deseret Bookshelf – Deseret Book’s Library in Your Pocket

Search, study, read, and listen to uplifting, family-friendly content—all in one powerful app. The new Deseret Bookshelf is the most comprehensive source for wholesome eBooks, audiobooks, and podcasts for individuals and families alike.

Start with 8 free Latter-day Saint eBooks and unlock access to hundreds more—all at no cost. Your Library keeps all your Deseret Book purchases in one convenient place. Subscribe to Deseret Bookshelf+ for unlimited access to a wide-ranging collection of gospel, fiction, and nonfiction titles—including romance, suspense, inspirational voices, Church history, and more. That’s over 4,000 eBooks and the full audiobook catalog in one app.

Key Features

Wholesome Content

- Discover uplifting content that inspires faith, joy, and purpose.
- Curated for all ages—perfect for personal study and family time.
- Listen to audiobooks and talks from trusted Latter-day Saint voices.
- Enjoy clean stories with meaningful, family-centered themes.

Discover & Search

- Browse thousands of inspiring eBooks and audiobooks by genre or theme.
- Explore rich categories like gospel study, romance, fantasy, and suspense.
- Stream gospel-focused podcasts with insights from Church members and leaders.
- Find content quickly with smart filters and universal search.
- Follow beloved authors and access their most popular works.

eBook Reader & Study Tools

- Customize fonts, spacing, and light/dark modes to suit your reading style.
- Choose between scroll or page-flip mode.
- Highlight passages, bookmark favorites, and add personal notes.
- Tap scripture references to view linked verses instantly in context.
- Sync your markups and progress across all your devices.

Audiobook Player

- Listen to over 2,500 professionally narrated audiobooks and talks.
- Use chapter skip, 30-second rewind/forward, playback speed control, and sleep timer.
- Enjoy full background listening and cross-device syncing.
- New mini player keeps audio controls accessible while you browse.

Podcasts

- Subscribe to uplifting Latter-day Saint podcasts.
- Manage episodes with auto-playback and library organization.
- Download for offline listening or stream anywhere.
- Control playback speed to listen at your preferred pace.

Inspiration & Sharing

- Start your day with a new, uplifting quote.
- Share highlights or passages with friends via text, email, or social media.
- Let others know what books and authors are inspiring your journey.

Free Starter Library

Create an account and instantly receive 8 classic Latter-day Saint titles:

1. All These Things Shall Give Thee Experience – Neal A. Maxwell
2. The Power of Everyday Missionaries – Clayton M. Christensen
3. The Beginning of Better Days – Sheri Dew & Virginia Pearce
4. Be Your Best Self – Thomas S. Monson
5. Jesus the Christ – James E. Talmage
6. Lectures on Faith – Joseph Smith
7. The Joseph Smith Papers – Joseph Smith
8. Gospel Doctrine – Joseph F. Smith

You’ll also get access to the Standard Works, Church manuals, General Conference talks, and official Church publications—all included at no cost.

Deseret Bookshelf+ Subscription

Unlock unlimited access to:

- The full Deseret Book audiobook collection
- Thousands of premium and exclusive eBooks
- The subscriber-only “Sunday on Monday” podcast
- New titles added regularly

Whether you’re commuting, studying, or winding down at night, Deseret Bookshelf helps you stay spiritually nourished with uplifting content—anytime, anywhere.

Download now and experience the joy of wholesome reading and listening.

raw_data.releaseNotes: In this version we fixed various bugs related to ebook usage and audiobook usage.  We hope you enjoy using Bookshelf!

apps.title: Nextory: Audiobooks & E-books
apps.description:
Step into the wonderful world of books with Nextory. Now you can listen to audiobooks and read eBooks without any limit. It’s very simple to stream books in the app directly on your iPhone or iPad. Nextory is always available. At any time - online and offline - as long and as often as you want.
 
Sign up today and enjoy 14 days or even more of free unlimited reading and listening with Nextory. You will get access to over 200 000 books right away. No matter what kind of books you are looking for - bestsellers, crime novels, thrillers, non-fiction, or feelgood. You will always find the stories that you like in our huge library.
 
Your advantages with Nextory:
 
Read eBooks comfortably and anywhere - at home or on the road.
Listen to audiobooks anytime you want: on vacation, while commuting, to relax and in between.
Read and listen online or offline by downloading audiobooks and eBooks directly to your iPhone or iPad.
Huge library of excellent audiobooks and eBooks with over 200 000 titles in total from the genres such as non-fiction, novels, thrillers, children's books, fantasy, and many other categories.
Discover new audiobooks and eBooks that you like. Based on your reading history, we create individual reading and listening tips tailored to your needs.

With our eBook reader it is possible to...
 
... place an automatic bookmark. You can mark a place in a book and easily go back or start in the exact same place where you paused before.
… adjust the font size, screen brightness and background color individually to your liking or depending on your reading environment.
… turn pages or jump back and forth between chapters and books in a trouble-free and easy way.
… get an even better reading experience with the double-page view in iPad, which delivers a feeling close to a physical book.
… save your favorite locations using markers and bookmarks.
 
With our audiobook player it is possible to:

...increase or decrease the reading speed in different steps to individually choose your desired speed.
… simply use our navigation bar to fast-forward or rewind if you want to go back to a specific place in the book you would like to listen to.
… set a sleep timer that will automatically stop the player after a specific amount of time.
… use the bookmark function to mark out a good part of the book or to continue to listen exactly where you last stopped or paused.
... keep track of how much of you have left of the book you are listening to.
… continue to listen even in energy-saving mode and enjoy your favorite audiobooks anytime you want.

Sign up today and enjoy the benefits with Nextory! 
With Nextory you can enjoy unlimited reading and listening anytime, anywhere. You will always have your favorite audiobooks and eBooks with you no matter where you are - in your smartphone or iPad. apps.title: Dygest Audio Books & Book Club
apps.description:
Experience free audio books and book summaries. 
Read, listen, and join the community. 
Discover new ebooks, philosophy, motivation, and wellness content. 
Perfect for students, productivity seekers, and book lovers.

Dygest is your gateway to understanding the world through ideas. With over 2000 book summaries and expert analyses, Dygest helps you learn faster, think more critically, and connect with the vibrant BookTok community

Whether you’re passionate about philosophy, fascinated by global culture, or eager to sharpen your mind, Dygest is designed for curious thinkers who value growth and reflection.

DISCOVER THE POWER OF KNOWLEDGE IN JUST 15 MINUTES

Philosophy: Engage with timeless questions about ethics, life, and human nature
Culture: Understand the stories and values shaping societies across the globe
Critical Thinking: Develop sharper insights into today’s challenges
Self-improvement: Discover tools to grow personally and professionally

With Dygest, you can access content that helps you better understand the complexities of our world while sharing your discoveries with the thriving BookTok community.

WHAT YOU’LL FIND ON DYGEST:
Concise book summaries designed for quick learning
In-depth literary analysis by academic experts
A wide range of categories: Philosophy, Culture, History, Psychology, Self-improvement, Science, Economics, Arts
A growing digital library updated regularly to keep you inspired

Whether you’re diving into philosophy classics or exploring modern debates on culture and society, Dygest makes it easy to learn something new every day.

WHY CHOOSE DYGEST?
Learn smarter: Absorb key concepts in just minutes
Think critically: Strengthen your understanding with expert insights
Expand your culture: Discover diverse perspectives across disciplines
Join BookTok: Connect with a passionate community of readers and thinkers
Improve yourself: Access tools for personal and professional growth

Dygest isn’t just an app. it’s a tool for transformation. Whether you’re a student looking to expand your knowledge, a professional seeking fresh perspectives, or someone eager to engage with the latest trends on BookTok, Dygest is here to help you grow.

Download today and start your journey toward smarter learning!

apps.title: Reavol - Summary books
apps.description:
Reavol - Helps you read more quickly than ever

Reavol allows you to read a book in 80% less time than a typical book. The Reavol program condenses the key ideas from the books into succinct summaries, making it simple for you to learn new information and read and listen to book summaries whenever and wherever you like. Your favorite quotes can be saved and easily shared on social media using the Reavol application's summary book.


Reavol - Book Summary: A Place to Share Your Story

Do you have an original thought? Want to reach more readers with your creation? Reavol allows you to fully upload your works to the program and earn money directly from the work.


Reavol - Book summary: Read books you enjoy every day.

There are around 20 different book genres available in the audio book store. Whether at home, on the road, at breaks, or in airport lounges, you may listen to the synopsis and the entire book. With the motivational voiceover recorded live, speed adjustments, and user-friendly technologies that are simple to use, users can fully listen to books without missing content.


Reavol - Book summary: A bookcase for all audiences

Reavol creates bookcases to accommodate a variety of users:

Business bookshelf: To aid all entrepreneurs, leaders, and interested audiences, Reavol's business bookcase chooses the best and most significant books on leadership, business, job skills, spiritual titles, and lessons on entrepreneurship by authors who are world-renowned founders.

Bookcase for kids: Parents can play audiobooks for their kids at any time, or they can let them read their preferred genres. Children's bookcases by Reavol feature development-oriented content genres such comics, fairy tales, children's poetry, encyclopedias, and scientific discoveries.

Local Bookcase: This function is compared to a map of Reavol. Readers can use the neighborhood Bookcase to search and read good books about the country's history and fall in love with every Vietnamese province's unique attractiveness in terms of its people, culture, and cuisine.

Reavol - Book Summary: Simple Book Digitization

With the app's usage of AI technologies. Reavol gives customers the option to convert photos to text and audio formats online.


============================

Terms of use and user privacy: https://reavol.com/privacy
Join the app user community at: https://bit.ly/3ydE9KB
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reavol.official/
Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/reavolvn

Automatic renewal information via Apple payment channel:
- For the 7-days package
+ it will cost 45,000 VND / 7 days
- For the 1-month package
+ it will cost 99,000 VND / 1 month
- For the 1-year package, there will be 2 prices for 2 target users
+ With normal users, it will cost 299,000 VND / 1 year
+ For users who are members of Reavol's partner businesses, the price is only 149,000 VND / 1 year
Apple will automatically renew each cycle
Apple will deduct money from your iTunes account after you confirm the transaction agreement
Automatic renewal of the plan no later than 24 hours after the end of the previous period
You can view the information or cancel the renewal in the Settings section of your Itunes account.

apps.title: Book Tracker: Reading Journal
apps.description:
Book Tracker is the perfect companion for every book lover, available on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Easily track your books—whether they’re already on your shelf or on your wishlist for future reading.

For avid readers, managing a growing book collection can be a challenge. That’s where Book Tracker shines, making it faster and easier than ever to organize your reading life. Track all the books you own and see your reading progress at a glance. Plus, create a wishlist of the books you’re eager to pick up next. Whether in your Library or on your Wishlist, Book Tracker showcases detailed information and beautiful cover art for each book. And for those rare or hard-to-find books, you can add them manually with ease.

Book Tracker is free to download and limited to 5 books. Unlock unlimited books across iPhone and iPad with a single in-app purchase, and enjoy full functionality on Mac with a separate purchase.

With Book Tracker, you can look forward to:

- Effortless synchronization across devices — Save a book on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, and it will sync seamlessly across all your devices. Both your Library and Wishlist are always up to date, ensuring you’ll never lose track of your books—or accidentally buy the same one twice!

- Comprehensive book organization — Easily categorize each book as read, reading, or unread. Use tags to find similar books in your collection. Edit details like title, author, description, publisher, publication year, genre, and more to keep your Library accurate and personalized.

- Reading Timer — Track the time you spend reading each book with the new Reading Timer feature, helping you understand and optimize your reading habits.

- Borrowed Books Management — Keep track of the books you’ve borrowed and read, so you’ll never forget what you owe or which stories you’ve already enjoyed.

- Save and revisit your favorite quotes — Found a memorable passage? Save your favorite quotes within the app to enjoy them anytime. You can even showcase them on your Home screen with a widget.

- In-depth stats at your fingertips — View your library and reading statistics right on your Home screen with stunning widgets. iPad users can enjoy an extra-large widget for even more detailed insights.

- Seamless importing from other services — Easily bring in your book collections from Goodreads, Delicious Library, Storygraph, BookBuddy, Reading List, Book Crawler, and more. Export your library to PDF or CSV for backup or sharing.

- Deep integration with iOS and macOS — Take advantage of the latest Apple features, including Shortcuts, Siri and Live Activity, while using widgets to keep your favorite quotes, books and statistics always within reach.

- Your privacy, guaranteed — Book Tracker doesn’t collect your personal data or track you in any way. Enjoy your books without worrying about privacy.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* Fixed small layout issues on the reading sharing page
* Fixed a problem with the formatting of the listening time in the statistics widget
* Minor fixes and improvements

Book Tracker is crafted by an indie developer. Your feedback and suggestions help shape future updates. If you find the app useful, a review would mean a lot. For any support, contact me at support@booktrack.app.

Simone

apps.title: Bookmory - reading tracker
apps.description:
Unleash Your Inner Bookworm with Bookmory - Your Ultimate Book Tracker

Searching for the perfect book tracker? Look no further! Bookmory is your all-in-one solution to effortlessly organize your reading life, build lasting habits, and truly remember what you read.  Whether you devour paperbacks, dive into ebooks, or listen to audiobooks, Bookmory helps you keep track of it all.

Effortless Book Tracking and Management:

* Add Books Quickly: Register any book in seconds using our integrated search or by simply scanning the barcode.
* All Formats Welcome:  Manage your entire library in one place, whether it's physical books, ebooks, or audiobooks.
* Track Your Progress:  Log your page count and reading time with the easy-to-use reading timer.  Watch your progress soar and stay motivated!
* Personalized Organization: Categorize your books with custom tags for easy searching and sorting.

Enhance Your Reading Experience:

* Insightful Stats:  Dive deep into your reading habits with beautiful and powerful statistics. Discover your reading pace, favorite genres, and more!
* Stay Motivated: Set daily and annual reading goals to challenge yourself and celebrate your achievements.  Bookmory will even cheer you on!
* Remember More:  Capture your thoughts and insights with our powerful note editor. Underline favorite quotes, create stylish notes, and even share them with beautiful backgrounds.
* Review and Reflect: Rate and review finished books to build your personalized reading history and share your recommendations.

Security and Reliability:

* Cloud Backup: Secure your precious reading data with Google Cloud Backup. Never worry about losing your progress.
* Password Protection: Keep your reading journey private with optional password protection.

More Than Just a Book Tracker:

Bookmory helps you cultivate a deeper connection with your reading.  Visualize your progress with the monthly reading calendar and feel the satisfaction as your virtual bookshelf grows.  It's more than just an app; it's your personal reading companion.

Download Bookmory today and transform your reading journey!

Contact: tonysoft.net@gmail.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Reorganized the timeline to be more readable.
2. Made it possible to input 0 and decimal points in series numbers.
3. Added a setting to choose how reading progress is displayed for books being read.
4. Fixed some translations.
5. Fixed some bugs.

Transform your phone photos into premium photo books and stunning wall art with just a few taps.

AI PHOTO BOOKS
Your trips automatically become beautiful hardcover photo books. AI finds your best travel memories and creates ready-to-order books in seconds. Hardcover with premium pages, same price no matter how many pages, free shipping, no hidden fees.

STICKABLE PHOTO TILES
 • Turnkey wall décor — unbox, stick, enjoy!
 • Magnetic hanging system, no nails required
 • Multiple sizes available

HIGH QUALITY GUARANTEED
We guarantee prints you'll love. The app will warn you if the resolution is too small.

100% FREE TO USE
No subscription required. The app will guide you through the entire ordering process with easy ordering and convenient tracking.

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
Shipping to nearly every corner of the world. We're committed to delivering your order in about a week, or less!

Loved by millions with 100,000+ reviews. From AI-powered photo books to customizable wall tiles, millions of customers trust Mixtiles to bring their memories to life.

Join thousands of users on the journey to become the best versions of yourself. Read or listen to key insights from 1,500+ nonfiction bestselling books in just a few minutes!



Invest in yourself. Download the app now and start your journey towards learning and self improvement. Learn the key lessons of bestselling nonfiction books in minutes.


The app helps you in 3 distinct ways:

  Combine the power of artificial intelligence with your love for reading, unlocking a whole new level of understanding and insights from your favorite books in a convenient and efficient way



  Save your valuable time by providing concise summaries of books, capturing the essence of the content, and distilling it into easily digestible formats


  Lets you read or listen to your favorite author on the go

 A DAILY FREE BOOK SUMMARY to fit into your routine

 CUSTOMIZED bite-sized content according to your goals

 INSIGHTS from curated quotes to inspire you 

 CHALLENGES & COLLECTIONS to keep you focused on your goals

apps.description:
Free your photos from your phone and make beautiful photo books that you can treasure for a lifetime.

*** Printastic was featured in the AppStore "Best New Apps", in the Photo & Video category, May 2015! ***

Printastic is the best and easiest way to print your photos from your iPhone or iPad. Select your photos, choose the custom layout that makes you happy, and we'll ship your finished book to you in just a few days.

Our photo books make a fantastic gift or keepsake to mark any special occasion. From Christmas and birthdays, to graduations, weddings, new babies, or travel stories, you can document any occasion. When it’s this easy to print your favourite photos; why not treat yourself, and hold your memories in your hands?


App & Product Information

- Printastic books are 21x21cm, hardcover books that can contain 24 - 200 pages.
- Choose from multiple page layouts, and cover options.
- Select photos from your camera roll, Photo Stream, Facebook, Dropbox and Instagram
- Add text to help tell your story.
- Worldwide delivery. Tracked shipping options are available to anywhere in the world.
- Making a payment is simple and secure.
- Track your order from payment to arrival.

apps.title: Faithlife Ebooks
apps.description:
Access powerful Bible study tools and a theological library for biblical insights on the go. With the Logos mobile app, you can read the Bible and commentaries side by side, save books for studying offline, and use exclusive Logos Bible study tools.

Make Time for Reading, Even When You’re Booked
Organize and schedule your reading in seconds. Create a list of books in your library, then start a reading plan when you’re ready to dig in. 

Access All Your Bible Study Tools in One Location
Tap a word or passage to highlight, leave a note, and more, all with the enhanced text selection menu.

Find What You’re Looking for, Instantly
Access powerful search features from any book or resource. Quickly navigate to any verse in the Bible or search your library to go deeper.

Never Lose Your Audience—or Your Place
Easily read your sermon outline or manuscript, get a clear view of all your slides, and see a built-in timer to help you stay on track with Preaching Mode. 

Read your favorite Bible translations: we have a variety of options, including the NIV, ESV, NASB, NKJV, and many more.

TOP FEATURES:

LIBRARY - Instantly access up to ninety-five free resources to kick off your Bible study. Or sync your current Logos library to access all your books on the go.

PANEL LINKING - Get three independent channels for linking your resources so they track along with you as you read.

LAYOUTS FOR iPAD - Simultaneously use up to six books and/or tools on a single screen with Layouts on your tablet.

PASSAGE LIST - Use Reference Scanner to snap a picture of a document and look up many verses at once, then save those verses as a Passage List.

TABBED BROWSING - Open as many resources or Bibles as you want and view them side by side.

SPLIT SCREEN - Delve into any secondary resource side by side with your preferred Bible translation.

SEARCH - Find every mention of a word or phrase in every resource in your library.

READING PLANS - Get into daily reading with several Bible reading plans to choose from.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Fix issues with Canvas.

Previously:

* Word Info cards now show lemma frequency for deeper original language study
* Factbook adds a new Discover lens, and improved Theologies and Books sections
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: Sell books with World of Books
apps.description:
The Sell books with World of Books app makes it easy to earn extra money and declutter your home. Download the free app (previously known as Ziffit) to turn your used books and textbooks into cash.

•   Sell books or textbooks instantly

•   Scan barcodes with your iPhone or iPad

•   Get an instant quote and complete your trade

•   Ship your books for free with FedEx or USPS

•   Receive quick payments directly to your bank or PayPal account

With the Sell books with World of Books app, you can quickly and easily sell your used books. Simply scan barcodes, receive a quote, and complete the trade.

Curious about the value of your book collection? The app can tell you that, too.

The app is completely free, with no costs at any stage. Shipping is covered, and payments are completed within days—not weeks. Download the Sell books with World of Books app today and start selling whenever and wherever you like. Plus, first-time traders receive an extra 10% on their initial trade!

apps.title: Ola: Book Cab, Auto, Bike Taxi
apps.description:
Get a fast & affordable taxi ride with the Ola app, that too with just a few taps on your phone! From Ola Bike Taxis to Ola Autos to Ola Outstation rides, get it all on the Ola Cabs app. With vehicles in more than 200 cities across India including Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, and Pune, Ola Cabs is the most popular ride-hailing service in the entire country. The Ola app does more than just book rides. Not only can you send parcels within city limits with Ola Parcel, you can also get your favourite meal delivered to you! So what are you waiting for? Download the Ola app, complete our quick sign-up process and make your first taxi booking!
You can choose from our multiple travel options based on your convenience: Ola Bike Taxi, Ola Auto, Ola Mini, Ola Prime Sedan, Ola Prime Plus, Ola Outstation, Ola Rentals and many more. All Ola Cabs come equipped with onboard GPS for route navigation. 

Services available on the Ola Cabs app:
• Ola Bike Taxi
In a hurry or on a budget? Zip through traffic in an affordable Ola Bike Taxi. 
• Ola Auto
Tired of haggling and waiting for Autos? Make an Ola Auto booking now and get a ride at your doorstep.
• Ola Mini
From quick chores to long trips on the road, Ola Mini is the comfy and economical option you’re looking for!
• Ola Prime Sedan
Looking for a spacious ride and best-in-class experience? Relax in an Ola Prime Sedan! 
• Ola Prime Plus 
Ride in utmost comfort with Ola Prime Plus. Enjoy sedans, top driver-partners, the fastest allotment and no cancellation worries. 
• Ola Prime SUV
Supersized rides when you need more seats & comfort. Extra legroom and boot space for everyone.
• Ola Rentals
Perfect for those who want to rent a cab for a few hours. Got a day full of chores? Make multiple stops with Ola Rentals.
• Ola Outstation
Looking for an intercity cab? Why drive? Our Outstation taxis will get you to your destination comfortably.
• Ola Parcel
Need to send or receive packages within city limits? No need for a separate parcel delivery app. Book an Ola Parcel and get the job done at the lowest price.
• Food Delivery
Are you a foodie at heart? Get your favourite meals delivered home through the Ola app! Say hello to unlimited choices, affordable prices!

How to make a taxi booking on the Ola app:
• Set your pickup location (E.g. Home, Office, etc.)
• Enter your destination
• Choose from multiple payment options including Cash, Ola Money Wallet, PhonePe Wallet, Amazon Pay Wallet, UPI, Credit/Debit Card
• Book the ride option that suits you best
• Track your ride in real time

More benefits of taxi bookings with Ola Cabs:
• Secure OTP: Stay safe from the start with a secure one-time password for every cab ride.
• Schedule a ride: Choose ‘Schedule Ride’ to book a cab ride in advance from anywhere.
• SOS Safety Feature: Ola provides an Emergency call option immediately after the ride is confirmed. You can press the emergency button and get connected to the Safety Response team instantly.
• Emergency Contacts: You can add up to 5 emergency contacts & share the ride tracking link and driver details with them via SMS.
• Comfortable Corporate rides: Make business travel safer and simpler by tagging your work-related trips as Ola Corporate cab rides.

Got questions about the Ola app? Visit the Ola Cabs support website (https://help.olacabs.com/support/home) for more information or write to us at support@olacabs.com.

Stay up-to-date on all our exciting offers and latest happenings by connecting with us online.
• Follow us on Twitter - twitter.com/Olacabs
• Like our Facebook page - facebook.com/Olacabs
• Follow us on Instagram - instagram.com/olacabs

apps.title: ShweNote: 30 min book summary
apps.description:
Learn the key lessons of Non-fiction books in 15-30 Minutes.

There are over 100000+ books published every year. So, How to Read all of these books Faster? 
In our world today, we are often too busy to finish a book. Are you a busy person? Are you struggling to develop reading habit? Don't worry.

ShweNote summarizes the key ideas of the world’s bestselling books in Myanmar Language. You can remove your language barrier with ShweNote. ShweNote offering a fresh way of learning, and to promoting universal access to knowledge. 

Book Categories :

 - Business and Management
 - Sales and Marketing
 - Motivation and Happiness
 - History and Politics
 - Essential Knowledge
 - Education and Learning
 - Parenting and Relationship
 - Personal Development (Success)
 - Health and Food
 - Biography

App Features:

 - Top Quality Summarized Books
 - Audio Books
 - Personal Library
 - Offline Download Mode
 - Powerful EPUB Reader
 - Weekly New Books
 - Weekly Free Book
 - Affordable Subscription fee

More about us:

ShweNote is the first book summary app in Myanmar. You can read International Best Selling Books in just 15-30 minutes.

Our team consists of passionate members with various educational backgrounds. Our mission is to introduce the world's best selling books to Myanmar People. We hope our effort can support to build the better country.

COPYRIGHT NOTICE: Some of the contents and book covers are loaded from public sources.

apps.title: World of Hyatt: Book Hotels
apps.description:
Plan, book, and manage your hotel and resort stays with ease. With the World of Hyatt app, enjoy the best rate guaranteed when you book direct, making every journey seamless and rewarding. Not a member yet? Join for free to get exclusive rates and earn points towards travel rewards 
 
MANAGE YOUR STAY WITH CONVENIENT FEATURES 
- Book hotel stays with World of Hyatt points, cash or both 
- Explore hotel photos, details, offers, local attractions, and more for effortless trip planning 
- Save your favorite hotels and resorts for future travel 
- Add your hotel reservations and World of Hyatt membership card to Apple Wallet 
- Bypass the front desk with mobile check-in, digital key, and express checkout 
- See your room charges in real-time 
- View and download folio from previous stays 
 
MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME 
- Request items to your room, such as extra pillows, towels and toothpaste (where applicable) 
- Order room service (where applicable) 
- Stream your favorite shows on your in-room TV with Google Chromecast (where applicable) 
 
ACCESS YOUR LOYALTY PROGRAM ACCOUNT 
- Track your progress toward elite status and Milestone Rewards 
- View your current member benefits and explore other elite tier benefits 
- Track your progress towards free nights via our Brand Explorer 
- View and redeem points, and track available for redemption  
- Register for new offers and track your progress towards earning directly in the app 
 
Available in English, Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) and Korean 
 
About Hyatt Hotels Corporation 
Hyatt Hotels Corporation, headquartered in Chicago, is a leading global hospitality company guided by its purpose – to care for people so they can be their best. As of March 31, 2025, the Company's portfolio included more than 1,450 hotels and all-inclusive properties in 79 countries across six continents. The Company's offering includes brands in the Luxury Portfolio, including Park Hyatt®, Alila®, Miraval®, Impression by Secrets, and The Unbound Collection by Hyatt®; the Lifestyle Portfolio, including Andaz®, Thompson Hotels®, The Standard®, Dream® Hotels, The StandardX, Breathless Resorts & Spas®, JdV by Hyatt®, Bunkhouse® Hotels, and Me and All Hotels; the Inclusive Collection, including Zoëtry® Wellness & Spa Resorts, Hyatt Ziva®, Hyatt Zilara®, Secrets® Resorts & Spas, Dreams® Resorts & Spas, Hyatt Vivid Hotels & Resorts, Sunscape® Resorts & Spas, Alua Hotels & Resorts®, and Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts; the Classics Portfolio, including Grand Hyatt®, Hyatt Regency®, Destination by Hyatt®, Hyatt Centric®, Hyatt Vacation Club®, and Hyatt®; and the Essentials Portfolio, including Caption by Hyatt®, Hyatt Place®, Hyatt House®, Hyatt Studios, Hyatt Select, and UrCove. Subsidiaries of the Company operate the World of Hyatt® loyalty program, ALG Vacations®, Mr & Mrs Smith, Unlimited Vacation Club®, Amstar® DMC destination management services, and Trisept Solutions® technology services. For more information, please visit www.hyatt.com.

apps.description:
KNOWLEDGE FROM 8000+ BOOKS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Unlock powerful ideas in just minutes with our concise summaries of today’s most impactful books. Whether you're looking to grow personally or professionally, our library of over 9,000 book summaries and expert-curated content will help you learn smarter, not harder.

DISCOVER THE ESSENCE OF 8,000+ TOP BOOKS & MAGAZINES

Books: Dive into summaries of bestselling books in just 15 minutes.
Magazines: Get the core insights from top magazines.
Sharpen Your Skills: Access leading business books and magazines to enhance your career.
Personal Growth: Explore life-changing self-improvement titles.
Expand Your Horizons: Find fresh perspectives in economics, science, history, and culture.
Inspiration: Stay ahead with trending ideas and innovations in your field.

LEARN ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH AUDIO & TEXT
Listen on the Go: Audio versions of summaries fit seamlessly into your daily routine.
Hands-Free Learning: Use Autoplay to learn while at the gym, in the car, or doing chores.
Offline Access: Premium users can download content to listen without an internet connection.

CONNECT & GROW WITH COLLECTIONS
Curate Your Learning: Organize your goals with personalized Collections.
Share & Collaborate: Invite others to join your Collections.

PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS & EXPERT CURATION
Tailored Recommendations: Premium users can discover what to read or listen to next based on their interests.
Expert Guidance: Let professionals guide you through essential topics with interactive tools.
Curated Lists: Find motivation with book recommendations handpicked by experts.

EXPERIENCE A PERSONAL TOUCH
Top Picks Only: Our editorial team hand-selects each book for its value.
Exclusive Insights: Listen to summaries made in collaboration with creators.
Beautifully Written: Enjoy summaries crafted by experts who excel at simplifying complex ideas.

READY TO LEVEL UP?
Getting started is easy. Download the Accelerated app today and enjoy a 7-day free trial with unlimited access. Choose from a monthly or annual plan when you’re ready to continue your learning journey!

Explore 8,000+ Book Summaries Across 25 Categories
Get Personalized Book Recommendations

Unlock powerful ideas in just minutes with our concise summaries of today’s most impactful books. Whether you're looking to grow personally or professionally, our library of over 9,000 book summaries and expert-curated content will help you learn smarter, not harder.

DISCOVER THE ESSENCE OF 8,000+ TOP BOOKS & MAGAZINES

Books: Dive into summaries of bestselling books in just 15 minutes.
Magazines: Get the core insights from top magazines.
Sharpen Your Skills: Access leading business books and magazines to enhance your career.
Personal Growth: Explore life-changing self-improvement titles.
Expand Your Horizons: Find fresh perspectives in economics, science, history, and culture.
Inspiration: Stay ahead with trending ideas and innovations in your field.

LEARN ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH AUDIO & TEXT
Listen on the Go: Audio versions of summaries fit seamlessly into your daily routine.
Hands-Free Learning: Use Autoplay to learn while at the gym, in the car, or doing chores.
Offline Access: Premium users can download content to listen without an internet connection.

CONNECT & GROW WITH COLLECTIONS
Curate Your Learning: Organize your goals with personalized Collections.
Share & Collaborate: Invite others to join your Collections.

PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS & EXPERT CURATION
Tailored Recommendations: Premium users can discover what to read or listen to next based on their interests.
Expert Guidance: Let professionals guide you through essential topics with interactive tools.
Curated Lists: Find motivation with book recommendations handpicked by experts.

EXPERIENCE A PERSONAL TOUCH
Top Picks Only: Our editorial team hand-selects each book for its value.
Exclusive Insights: Listen to summaries made in collaboration with creators.
Beautifully Written: Enjoy summaries crafted by experts who excel at simplifying complex ideas.

READY TO LEVEL UP?
Getting started is easy. Download the Accelerated app today and enjoy a 7-day free trial with unlimited access. Choose from a monthly or annual plan when you’re ready to continue your learning journey!

Explore 8,000+ Book Summaries Across 25 Categories
Get Personalized Book Recommendations
Follow Audio Summaries
Daily Curated Book Selections
Audio Versions of Every Summary

On the Accelerated Basic plan? Enjoy one handpicked title every day. Ready to dive in? Download Accelerated now!

Terms of Use: https://tedapp.ai/explore/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://tedapp.ai/explore/privacy-policy

Need Help? Our friendly customer support team is here for you. Just email us at support@teadapp.ai.

apps.title: Air France - Book a flight
apps.description:
Meet a pocket-sized travel assistant designed to help you at every step of your journey.





From booking a flight, checking in, and receiving real-time flight updates to managing your Flying Blue account, the Air France app is your must-have travel tool.





BOOK A FLIGHT

Book your ticket for any of our destinations using your preferred secure payment method. To save time on future bookings, simply add your contact information to your profile, and we’ll prefill your details. 




OBTAIN YOUR BOARDING PASS

Check in, select your seat, and obtain your boarding pass directly in the app.




STAY INFORMED

Turn on notifications and get real-time flight updates and exclusive content about your destination. You can also share your flight status with your loved ones to stay in touch with those on the ground.




MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Need to review your ticket conditions, update your contact information or make a last-minute change to your booking? Manage your booking seamlessly directly in the app.



ENHANCE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE

Go the extra mile and add one of our extra travel options to your booking with a simple click (seat selection, special meals, lounge access, and more).



A SPECIAL SERVICE FOR YOUR CHILD

Is your child traveling alone via the trusted Kids Solo service? Track and manage their journey directly in the app.



ACCESS YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT

Check your Miles balance, book a rewards flight, modify your profile, and access your virtual Flying Blue card!

raw_data.releaseNotes: This update fixes some bugs to increase the app's performance. We are constantly working on improving your experience. Please take a few minutes to tell us what you think!

apps.title: LeapAhead-Daily Book Cast
apps.description:
Welcome to LeapAhead! With over 30,000 summaries of bestselling books at your fingertips, you can easily dive into a wealth of insights, skills, advice, and knowledge across more than 20 categories, including career, family, parenting, health, finance, love, efficiency, leadership, communication, relationships, investment, productivity, and self-care.

Are you ready to make a quick LeapAhead? Read, listen, and expand your horizons with insights from acclaimed authors and experts!

-----------------------
With LeapAhead you will get：

* Vast Library: Access 30,000+ book summaries seamlessly.

* 20+ categories: self-growth, business & money, productivity, happiness, health, family, etc.

* High-Quality SUMMARY: CRASH COURSES from renowned experts and creators.

* Efficient Growth: 15-20 minutes per book, acquire BIG IDEAS and deep insights from bite-sized key points.

* Audiobook: Enjoy a SOOTHING and pleasant listening experience! Learn hands-free, anytime, anywhere.

* Personalized Reading Lists: TOP booklists just for you, solving your problems with quality reads.

* Explore Search: Easily and quickly discover books of your interest, and support Book Request.

* Book Requests: With a library of over a million titles, you can easily request summaries of any books you want to read or listen to.

-----------------------
Who Benefits?

* Craving growth but short on time? 15 Minutes A Book: Elevate yourself in just a coffee break! Expand Your Mind: Dive into top books, bite-sized.

* Want to boost your career or build wealth? Take a quick crash course with books on Business & Career, Money & Investment, and Leadership for professional tips and guidance.

* Striving for family happiness and harmonious relationships? Dive into life's profound themes of Spirituality, Family, and Happiness. Specialists and Psychologists offer insights and solutions for a fulfilling life.

* Finding it inconvenient to carry physical books, and there aren't many situations suited for reading? Store your books on your phone and free your hands by listening to audiobooks! LeapAhead empowers you to access knowledge anytime, anywhere.

* Have you ever spent a lot of time reading a book only to forget its key points? Lost in a sea of scattered notes? Why not read the summaries instead? Reader Smarter, not harder!

Read daily and uncover a new you. Don't watch the clock, do what it does. Keep going!

-----------------------
Users Said That:

"Perfect one for those who love to read books even when they have little time to read." ---Amanda Smith

"Absolutely astonishing... If you have time, instead of spending it solely on social media, invest it in reading books like this. I guarantee you'll love it!" ---Daniel Martinez

"LeapAhead introduced me to a new path to success, revealing previously unnoticed factors contributing to my setbacks. Its strong motivational tone greatly encourages me." ---Joseph Taylor

-----------------------
LeapAhead Together!

Please let us hear your voice! We genuinely hope to assist everyone who aspires to self-improvement and positive change. Therefore, we will carefully listen to and address each of your suggestions and comments. LeapAhead shares the world's voices with you and hopes to hear echoes from each and every one of you, too. Let's LeapAhead together to become better versions of ourselves!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New Version Release

Comprehensive optimization of multiple UX features

Enhanced interaction fluency and operational intuitiveness

We look forward to your experience with this meticulously crafted update

apps.title: Magibook - Book Reading App
apps.description:
Discover the joy of reading with Magibook - the app that changes books to match your reading level. Perfect for beginners, English learners, parents, children, and anyone who wants to enjoy books more easily.

What Magibook Offers:

•Makes Books Easier: Every book comes in four reading levels.
•Lots of Books: Read many different books, from philosophy to literary classics.
•Helps You Learn English: Great for ESL, EFL, IELTS, and TOEFL
•Good for Kids: Many valuable books can now readable by children.
•Special features for dyslexia, ADHD, and other reading challenges
•Easy-to-Use Dictionary: Learn new words as you read.
•See Your Progress: Watch how your reading gets better over time. 

For English Learners: 
Improve your English through reading. Start easy and progress to harder books. Boost vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension with famous books in simpler language. Great for IELTS and TOEFL preparation.

For Parents: 
Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone: 
We make difficult books simpler, so everyone can enjoy great literature regardless of reading challenges. Perfect for those with dyslexia or ADHD.

Why Choose Magibook?

•Personalized reading experience
•Encourages lifelong reading habits
•Improves English skills for ESL/EFL learners
•Supports special education needs
•Makes classic literature accessible
•Aids in exam preparation
•Provides graded readers for improvement
•Offers abridged versions of complex texts
•Enhances vocabulary and grammar
•Improves reading comprehension and speed 

Available Books: Magibook offers a wide range of famous books at different reading levels, including:

"Don Quixote" by Miguel de Cervantes, "War and Peace" by Leo Tolstoy, "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen, "Les Miserables" by Victor Hugo, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.

From philosophy to adventures, from romances to mysteries, Magibook brings you the best books in a way you can enjoy.

With Magibook, you can:

•Read classic novels at your level
•Improve English vocabulary and grammar
•Prepare for language tests
•Help children develop reading skills
•Make reading easier with dyslexia or ADHD
•Explore philosophy and complex ideas
•Enjoy literature in simplified English
•Track reading progress
•Use an integrated dictionary
•Find books matching your reading level 

Suitable for all language levels: A1 (Beginner), A2 (Elementary), B1, B2(intermediate), C1 (advanced), or C2 (proficiency).

Don't let difficult books hold you back. With Magibook, you can read anything. From beginner level to advanced literature, from children's stories to philosophical works. It's like having a reading tutor, dictionary, and vast library in one app.

Upgrade to Magibook Unlimited - our premium subscription giving you unlimited access to our entire digital book library and premium features, plus be first to access new book releases and reading tools as they launch. Not ready to subscribe? Try Magibook with our selection of free classic books.

Unlock your reading potential with Magibook - where every book is the right book for you.

Our mission is to increase accessibility to knowledge, understanding, and shared wisdom.

Install Magibook today, for free!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We update Magibook every week to make it even better for you! We are now available on iPad!
Some of our latest improvements:
-Introducing Magibook Unlimited! - We now offer an unlimited subscription for all our books and features!
-New home page design!
-Now added reader settings, you can change the font / size/ background color!
-More books and features are on the way


Do you like the app ? Rate us ! We are trying our best to make books accessible to everyone.

We are always open to feedback & suggestions!
If you would like submit a book request, feel free to reach out to us at : contact@magibook.co

apps.title: Skeelo: Audiobooks & Ebooks
apps.developer: SKEELO EDITORA, PRODUTOS E SERVICOS DIGITAIS LTDA
apps.description:
O Skeelo é o app ideal para quem ama livros, ebooks e audiobooks. Nossa biblioteca digital traz os melhores títulos para você ler e ouvir no seu tempo. Se você procura um app de leitura como o Kindle ou Kobo, vai adorar nossa seleção de livros digitais.
Explore um acervo incrível:
- Best-sellers e lançamentos de grandes autores
- Milhares de livros digitais e audiobooks disponíveis: de romances a livros de negócios, no Skeelo você encontra o seu gênero literário favorito.
- Leitura do seu jeito: experiência personalizada para leitura e escuta
• Escolha a fonte, ajuste o tamanho e ative o modo noturno
• Marque páginas, destaque trechos e continue de onde parou
• Leia e ouça offline, sem precisar de internet
• Controle de velocidade do áudio
• Audiobooks narrados por vozes incríveis para mergulhar em histórias emocionantes
Como funciona o Skeelo?
1. Baixe o app e faça o cadastro
2. Valide se você já possui o benefício para receber livros gratuitamente todos os meses*
3. Leia ou ouça em qualquer hora e lugar! Todos os nossos ebooks e audiobooks são escolhidos a dedo pelo nosso time de curadoria.
*O Plano Preemium está incluso nos planos da Vivo, Claro, Oi, Sem Parar, Recarga Pay, SKY, Desktop e muitos outros parceiros para usar à vontade, sem custo adicional.
Dúvidas gerais:
• A leitura de ebooks, minibooks e o consumo de audiobooks são realizados dentro do app Skeelo.
• Os títulos disponíveis variam de acordo com o seu plano disponibilizado através dos nossos parceiros. Os planos são: Super Light, Light, Intermediário, Regular ou Preemium.
• Você consegue realizar o upgrade de plano entrando em contato direto com o atendimento oficial dos nossos parceiros: Vivo, Claro, Oi, Sem Parar, Recarga Pay, SKY, Desktop e outros.
Baixe agora e transforme sua forma de ler e ouvir histórias!
Nos acompanhe nas nossas redes sociais (Instagram, TikTok, X e LinkedIn) ou acesse nosso site!
• skeelo.com
• blog.skeelo.com
• loja.skeelo.com
*Consulte nossos termos de uso em skeelo.com/termos

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Gett: Book black taxis
apps.description:
Gett -The Black Taxi App
Ride iconic black cabs across London with Gett - your go-to rideshare app for quick family trips, airport transfers, and everyday journeys. Available on demand or reserved in advance, with an average wait time of under 4 minutes in central London.

Download Gett now and book black cabs that come to you.

Book an Iconic Black Cab
Experience London's most comfortable and convenient ride in a spacious 5 or 6-seater black cab. Enjoy fast, door-to-door rides in premium vehicles, with a separate driver compartment for privacy and air conditioning that you control.

Reliable Airport Transfers
Book a taxi to and from all the major airports in London, including Heathrow and Gatwick. There's plenty of room for all your luggage! Fast airport rides with priority booking available.

Family-Friendly Taxis
Black cabs are perfect for families with spacious interiors, room for strollers, and kid-friendly features. Book quick, safe family rides across London with drivers you can trust.

Order for Family and Friends
Hail taxis for your loved ones with Gett Family. Book, pay, and track your taxi all in one place - from pickup to arrival. Whether you need to arrange a school drop-off, a hospital trip for an elderly relative, or simply a ride home late at night, they won’t need to download a thing.

Priority Booking & Fast Rides
Black cabs use bus lanes to beat traffic, making your journey faster than regular taxis. Need a ride urgently? Choose the Gett Priority option for even quicker pickup times.

Fully Accessible Rides
All black cabs are wheelchair accessible as a standard feature. Book accessible rides with confidence - every journey is designed to be comfortable for all passengers.

Get There Faster
Booking a black cab means getting a driver who has passed The Knowledge - the world's toughest taxi exam. Cabbies know the city better than a GPS and can beat the traffic by using bus lanes - making black cab trips the quickest way to travel by taxi.

Passenger Safety
At Gett, your safety is our priority. Vehicles and drivers are licensed by TfL, and their details are confirmed before arrival. You can track progress from order to destination. Additionally, we offer a range of safety features such as driver ratings and ride location sharing to support you on your journey.

Eco-Friendly Electric Cabs
Gett donates 1p to Trees for Cities, a registered charity (number 1032154), for every ride a customer books and completes through the app. We also offset all the CO2 emissions from those rides with certified carbon offsetting projects. You can also choose the e-black cab vehicle class to book an electric black taxi.

Pre-Book & On-Demand
Book a ride ahead of time, or hail a cab virtually with on-demand booking. Priority booking available for urgent journeys.

Price Estimates
See the estimated meter fare for your taxi trip before you book and pay cashless through the app.

Rate & Tip Your Driver
Give your cab driver a rating up to 5 stars and let other travelers know how they did. Leave drivers a tip directly in the app if you're happy with your trip!

Customer Support
Need help or have a question? You can reach our team, who are available 24/7 via the live chat function in the app.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Introducing: Live updates for rides!
Now you can see real-time ride updates on your lock screen or Dynamic Island. Get live status updates, driver details, and arrival times, all without opening the app.

Booking a black cab means getting a driver who has passed The Knowledge - the world's toughest taxi exam. Cabbies know the city better than a GPS and can beat the traffic by using bus lanes - making black cab trips the quickest way to travel by taxi.

Passenger Safety
At Gett, your safety is our priority. Vehicles and drivers are licensed by TfL, and their details are confirmed before arrival. You can track progress from order to destination. Additionally, we offer a range of safety features such as driver ratings and ride location sharing to support you on your journey.

Eco-Friendly Electric Cabs
Gett donates 1p to Trees for Cities, a registered charity (number 1032154), for every ride a customer books and completes through the app. We also offset all the CO2 emissions from those rides with certified carbon offsetting projects. You can also choose the e-black cab vehicle class to book an electric black taxi.

Pre-Book & On-Demand
Book a ride ahead of time, or hail a cab virtually with on-demand booking. Priority booking available for urgent journeys.

Price Estimates
See the estimated meter fare for your taxi trip before you book and pay cashless through the app.

Rate & Tip Your Driver
Give your cab driver a rating up to 5 stars and let other travelers know how they did. Leave drivers a tip directly in the app if you're happy with your trip!

Customer Support
Need help or have a question? You can reach our team, who are available 24/7 via the live chat function in the app.

apps.title: Luna - Book Tracker & TBR List
apps.description:
Luna is a reading tracker designed to enhance your reading experience.  Book tracking and reading stats are available at your fingertips, you can get information about any book, and get personalized reading stats.  Use the timer to track your reading sessions in real time, save books to your Currently Reading, Want to Read, or Finished book lists, and get insights into your reading habits with stat tracking and graphs on the profile screen. 

TRACK YOUR READING IN REAL TIME
- Start the reading session timer each time you read
- Pause the timer if you need to take a break, and resume when you get back
- Stop the timer when you're finished and save your reading log!
- Don't want to use the timer?  You can also add logs manually if you'd prefer.

ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS
- Set a reading goal right from the home screen
- View the books you've completed, and a progress bar showing how close you are to your goal
- Update your reading goal at any time
- Goal progress updates automatically with each log and book saved

ORGANIZE YOUR LIBRARY
- Keep track of your library with Currently Reading, Want to Read, and Finished lists
- Keep track of detailed book information, including lending information, ratings, reviews, and more
- Edit any book on your list easily

FIND NEW BOOKS
- Scan books by ISBN to import them into your library without having to type a thing!
- Search for any book and add it from the detail page
- Can't find what you're looking for?  Add a book manually!

Upcoming features:
- Search filtering
- Note taking
- Achievements
- Ambient sounds
- Reading plan
- and more!

You may purchase an auto-renewing subscription through an In-App Purchase.

• Auto-renewable subscription

• 1 year duration ($12.99), or lifetime access ($19.99)

• Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

• Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase

• Privacy policy: https://camerongreene98.wixsite.com/jggprivacy

• Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: BookHabit
apps.description:
BookHabit is the highest-quality reading and book tracker, library organizer, notetaker and reading companion for iOS.

For anyone from casual to avid readers, students, self-learners, parents & kids, book clubs, eBook readers, closet librarians, etc.

Gain insights into your reading habits. Finish books more quickly, get back to books you've set aside, organize your library, and learn more about what and who you love to read. Develop a rich history of your reading life, visualize your life in books over the years, bring up notes easily, pass book suggestions to friends.

Features include:

• Many ways to organize your reading lists
• Easily add books by barcode or author / title search
• Track your reading progress and history
• Organize and sort books with custom lists
• Make notes and easily find & search
• Export professional bibliographies (APA, MLA, etc.)
• Graphs charting your reading history
• Sophisticated but simple to use book search
• Hierarchical lists
• Visualize and improve your reading habits
• Rate books while you read
• Track books by kind (paper, eBooks, reference)
• Create libraries of thousands of books
• Complete backup & transfer system
• Inverted screen support / dark theme
• Support for all iPhone sizes
• Support for all iPads—from Minis to Pros!


BookHabit is NOT an eBook reader, but it can be used with ALL types of books — including electronic books — to organize and track your reading progress.

Information you collect over time in BookHabit is intended to last!
Great care is taken to make sure you never lose that information.

None of your personal data is shared with third parties.
No ads, no promotions, just you and your books.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New charts to learn about your reading habits:
Hourly, by week day, and monthly charts.

Timeline chart now allows pinch-to-zoom in/out.

apps.title: Books For Kids: Reading & Math
apps.description:
Premium library of read along books & math is an award winning app with exclusive educational books for children and toddlers.

LARGE LIBRARY OF KIDS BOOKS
Our unique library of read alongs, audio books and stories that read aloud to kids consists of read to me eBooks, flash cards and phonics, learning games (activities), toddler sing along songs for kids 2-11 years old and simplifies reading & learning for kids. 

It acts like your library that reads for you and helps parents teach kids English, teach reading, and get their children preschool and kindergarten ready as well as get ahead in elementary school. 

Our unique "Just Right" method, unique story and useful books/read along books offer the most authentic reading experience mimicking traditional finger tracking.

This app uses the "JUST RIGHT" methodology to engage kids age 5 in early reading & math learning. It is a growing library with new books in English, flashcards added weekly. An authentic reading experience in all books for kids to read where audio books for kids read aloud in an expressive human voice. A great collection of nonfiction books for kids that are globally relevant with amazing books and original best nonfiction books for children that will read along with kids. 

The app motivates with badges, rewards, and leaderboards. 

READ MORE, LEARN MORE
Our premium library of educational books is a reading library plus a reading app that helps improve English reading where children at home get instant access to children's books anytime. Unlike other books and stories apps, with this book app for kids, kids get to read all you can books. While many books apps are listed as education apps only Smart Kidz Club is one of the best educational apps offering deep learning without any animations or distractions.

Our amazing book library has original stories for kids and freshly written kids story books and tales for children. Storytime and story reading are important for kids. By reading moral stories, bedtime stories or stories read to you before bed, the little ones' imagination soars. When parents read their children story books or use a read aloud reader for  reading kids books, it helps them bond with an opportunity for interacting with kids. These stories for toddlers and story books for kids can be read-along with read to me mode. This elibrary has an audiobook player that reads books for kids to improve reading skills. Parents who don't find time for reading for kids or are not able to read aloud, our app with kids audiobooks enables kids to read and listen to the stories read aloud thus engaging both their senses of sight and sound. Our app has shown to improve reading skills, help reading and help kids learn how to read. Our popular grade 3 story books and grade 4th reading are kids stories on world holidays. Flint series is good for 8 year olds.

WHY OUR EDUCATIONAL BOOKS APP?
In addition to storytime for kids and fiction reading, our learning library app has a big collection of non fiction read aloud kids books and educational content. With a focus on education, this ebook library serves as an educational library for kids offering them grade reading and non fiction reading. Our educational books for kids and nonfiction library consists of phonics for kids where these read along books on phonics help kids learn to read and practice sight words. These must read books are for both 'read to you' and 'read with me' and go all the way from Kindergarten 1 (pre K books & flashcards) and Kindergarten 2 to Grade 5. Kids can learn sight words with sentences. Beginner reading kids books help beginner readers. Preschool books have fonts suitable for preschool reading books. Books for 11 year olds are valuable for school education. 


Terms of Use: https://smartkidzclub.app/terms-of-use

apps.title: French Reading and Audio Books
apps.description:
How to learn French? By reading and listening.

With simultane books feature you can read and listen at the same time. This will have huge impact for you to get familiar with French language. You will learn the reading and listening at the same time. This will help you with writing and speaking. 

This app has both. It will help you to learn French. It has 12 reading books in it. It will help you learn new French words. It is easy to use. Reading experience developed to be the best. 

It has hours of audiobooks in it. It will improve your listening. Listening and reading is important to speak a language. You can listen audio books in the background. It is fun to listen audiobooks while commuting.

There are books selected carefully for beginners in this app. These books are world classics. Thus, it is easy for you to understand the content of the books.

The books in the application are;
- Les Aventures de Tom Sawyer
- Poil De Carotte
- Alice au Pays des Merveilles
- De l'autre cote du miroir
- Les Voyages de Gulliver
- Jean qui grogne et Jean qui rit
- 20000 Lieues sous les mers
- Cinq semaines en ballon
- Contes de la Becasse
- Contes choisis de la famille
- Les petites filles modeles
- Nouveaux contes de fees pour les petits enfants

and many French audio books...

For more, please visit https://watchtowerapps.com

Cancellation of Subscription:
To manage your subscription, follow the instructions at: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

Privacy Policy:
Your privacy is of utmost importance to us. Read our policy at: https://watchtowerapps.com/privacy/app/French%20Reading%20And%20Audiobooks

Terms of Use:
For the terms governing the use of our app, please visit: http://watchtowerapps.com/terms/app/French%20Reading%20And%20Audiobooks

For any inquiries, kindly reach out to us at hello@watchtowerapps.com. We are here to assist you!

apps.title: Ebook Reader
apps.description:
eBooks.com's Ebook Reader lets you read your favourite books on the go. Go to eBooks.com and choose from a massive collection of popular books that you can download in a jiffy. Or read your books online from any internet-connected device.

Ebook Reader is free, and optimized for the iPad, iPhone and iPod touch. It supports multitasking on both iPhone/iPad, and high resolution Retina Display graphics.

. Turn pages with a tap or swipe
. Zoom with a pinch
. Never lose your place in the book
. Landscape or portrait orientation is lockable . Read sample chapters before you buy
. Easy navigation inside the book 
. Search for text inside books . Night-reading mode is easy on the eyes . Adjust font size with a tap.
. Login with your existing eBooks.com account 
. Sync your eBooks.com online bookshelf with all your iOS devices 
. Online synchronization of your bookmarks, highlights, notes and reading place with all your iOS devices
. Importing of 3rd party books 
. Group your books in collections
. Free classics at your fingertips immediately 
. Online backup - your online ebook library is always accessible, so anytime you get a new phone, your books are ready to download from your eBooks.com bookshelf.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Faster, more reliable downloads
- App performance-related bug fixes

apps.title: Lera: Best eBooks & Webnovels
apps.description:
Enjoy your favorite books on the go with a customizable reading experience and millions of best sellers, novels, science fiction, romance, fantasy, fanfiction and more.

FEATURES

* Many Many Books
Provides both paid and free ebooks including romance, werewolf/vampire, billionaire, marriage, action, adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, fanfiction, LGBT, classic, xuanhuan, wuxia novel & more original work. New stories are updated daily!

* Moboreader Original Series
Sweet Twins: Indulge in Daddy's Love
Take my breath away
My Wife is an Aloof Beauty
The Spoiled Girl
Deep Affection: Honey, Come Back To Me
Billionaire's Gift
Rebirth of martial god

* Free Offer & Sale
Free books and special offers;
Free trial reading chapters and episodes;
Free Coins for you to buy paid ebooks and chapters.

* Customizable Reading Features
Build up your own bookshelf and enrich your collections.
Real paper book simulation, text size adjustment, night theme and more for you to find the best reading style.

* Read Books Offline
Save and preload your favorite stories and take them with you wherever you go, even when you're offline.
Import books from your phone and read EPUB files, text documents, UMD files and other 30 file formats of e-books with MoboReader.

* Audiobooks
Listen to all your favorite ebooks with our easy-to-use audiobook player.

About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions
- Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.
- Coins Packs: $20, $30, $50 and $100.
- Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
- Renewal: When you subscribe to check-in coins packs, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel your subscription. Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.
- Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

-Privacy Policy:：https://ptact.cdreader.com/app/privacy.html?client_proid=1009&mt=1
- Terms of Use:  https://ptact.cdreader.com/app/termsofservice.html
- Subscription Terms and Conditions：https://ptact.cdreader.com/app/CheckinCard/agreement.html

Any questions or advice? Please contact us:
Email: 
Site: https://www.lera.mobi
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Lera-112853690398969/

apps.title: Likewise: Movie, TV, Book Recs
apps.description:
The Likewise app helps you quickly cut through the clutter by learning what you like. Along with help from Pix, your personal entertainment companion powered by AI, and real recommendations from real people, you can discover even more ways to find your next favorite book, show, movie, and podcast!

The best recommendations- Personalized to your unique tastes, Likewise learns what you like to give you personalized recommendations every day.- Ask Pix to get recommendations instantly. Pix will get to know you and your preferences which will apply to future recommendations.- Likewise newsletters make it easy to stay up to date with what’s new and what’s worth watching, reading and listening to.

Crowd Sourced Recommendations- Enthusiasts come together on Likewise. Browse and share recommendations and connect with like-minded people in groups you’re interested in. Invite your friends and family and never miss what they’re enjoying.

One Entertainment App for All- Easily and quickly search across all your interests and streaming services to find what you want. Filter by genre, streaming service and more.- Create Lists to save all your favorites in one place and never lose track of the entertainment you want to remember. We love hearing from you! If you have questions or suggestions submit feedback in the app or contact us by emailing hello@likewise.com.  

EULA/Terms of Service: https://likewise.com/terms-of-service

raw_data.releaseNotes: Try the app without signing up! Explore reviews, discussions, asks, and the latest trending lists, or search for your next favorite book, movie, or podcast.

apps.title: Hooked
apps.description:
HOOKED is the hottest app for anime stories on your phone—bite-size, tap-through episodes with bold manga-style art, cinematic panels, and nonstop cliffhangers–loved by 100,000,000+ people worldwide!

Featured in New York Times, Fox, Forbes, CNN, CNBC, LA Times, Guardian, Publishers Weekly and more.

Why you’ll love HOOKED
- Access tons of episodes for FREE. Start reading instantly.
- Explore the world’s largest selection of webcomics. Spanning diverse genres like horror, thriller, sci-fi, romance, fantasy, and more.
- Read, listen, or watch. Choose your format and switch anytime—perfect for quick breaks or all-night binges.
- Personally tailored picks. Smart recommendations and trending charts help you find your next obsession fast.
- Built for your phone. Tap to advance, smooth transitions, and “just one more” pacing that keeps you turning panels.

Perfect if you love: anime, manga, webtoons, or serialized fiction with big twists and bigger emotions.

Join millions of fans discovering stories in a whole new way. You won’t believe how it ends…

HOOKED UNLIMITED SUBSCRIPTION:
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to our full story catalog and premium content
- The subscription is $9.99 weekly*
- You’ll be able to watch unlimited stories for the duration of your subscription
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off for at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- You can read our privacy policy and terms of use at http://www.hooked.co/privacy
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication

*Prices are equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.

By using Hooked, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines available at
https://www.hooked.co/terms

Questions? Email support@hooked.co for help!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Elsevier eBooks on VitalSource
apps.description:
Use Elsevier® eBooks to download and access Elsevier textbooks on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch. Read your books online or offline, search across your full library, and create notes and highlights to help you study.

Elsevier eBooks Features:

• Download books to your iOS device for easy online or offline reading.
• Simple, user-friendly navigation and a clean reading experience.
• Search inside your current book or across your full library.
• Select text to create notes or highlights from your mobile device.
• Tap to open figures, view captions and pinch to zoom.
• Sync your bookmarks, last page read and all of your notes and highlights between your iOS device and our desktop or web-based Elsevier eBooks apps.

Requirements:
• Elsevier eBooks account
• Access to one or more Elsevier textbooks
• iOS 15+

apps.title: Summrize Books
apps.description:
Bite Sized Knowledge,
Life Sized Impact.

Read Interactive Summaries of the Top Non-Fiction Books in Under 15 Minutes.

Summrize is a platform that provides summaries of the best non-fiction books. Our mission is to help you improve your life, business, and skills by extracting the most crucial insights from each book and presenting them in easy-to-read snippets. Save hours of reading time and still get the key takeaways! 

Save or share the snippets which you find the most helpful to you, and check into the app every day to build a good reading habit!

apps.title: BookWatch | Visual Learning
apps.description:
If you are a Visual learner this app is for you.
Learn new things in a fun and easy way. Get the key insights from non-fiction books in animated book summaries.
Our animated video summaries keep you focused and you can learn the best non-fiction books just by watching 30 minute videos. 

What if you could watch books?
- Never feel bored or overwhelmed again when it comes to learning new things.
- We deliver key ideas from nonfiction books in animated video summaries.

Why our book summaries are the best?
1. Thorough Summaries: We do thorough summaries covering all the ideas of the book. No more 10 minute summaries.
2. Whiteboard Animation: We use whiteboard animation videos to keep your attention. Never feel bored again when learning from books.
3. The Best Books: Get instant access to the best selling self-development and business book summaries.

Terms of use: https://www.bookwatch.com/terms-and-conditions-of-use

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We added new gamification features. Users now can get levels based on their knowledge points. Every idea of each book has a quiz that helps you learn the book even better. 
We also added a community feed, book requests, feature requests. Users now can follow other users and recommend books to each other in our community feed.

apps.title: Bookshelf: Book Tracker & List
apps.description:
Bookshelf helps you track your books, build a lasting reading habit, and better remember what you read—now with powerful AI-powered discovery tools to help you find your next great read!

Add books you’ve read, books you’re reading, and books you want to read. Improve your reading habits with insightful stats and trend reports. Stay motivated with reading goals, streaks, and reminders. Remember what you read by writing and reviewing notes and quotes.

BUILD YOUR LIBRARY
• Import & Sync – Import your existing libraries from Goodreads, Kindle, StoryGraph, or Reading List with a tap.
• Quick Add – Build your library by searching millions of books, scanning any book's barcode, or adding your own.
• Book Recommendations* – Discover trending books, find books based on your mood or any prompt, and browse curated collections to find your next read.
• Everything Tracker – Easily manage book collections, reading status, star ratings, reading dates, and more for all your books.
• Reading Sessions* – Pick up a book, start a session, and we’ll track everything so you can focus on reading.

IMPROVE YOUR READING HABITS
• Book Chat – Chat with our AI librarian to generate summaries and flash cards, discuss key ideas, and much more!
• Reading Stats – Visualize your reading habits over time with charts and reading stats.
• Reading Goals – Create a reading goal for the year to motivate yourself to read more or challenge your friends!
• Estimated Completion Time – See how long it will take to finish any book with your average reading speed.
• Reading Streaks* – Stay motivated by keeping up your streak!

REMEMBER WHAT YOU READ
• Smart Notes* – Use cards to jot down notes or vocab, write a summary, or prepare study questions. Scan text directly from books or add rich text of your own.
• Knowledge Quizzes* – Spaced-repetition quizzes on your note cards that will significantly increase your retention, guaranteed.
• Reading Reminders* – Never forget to read or test your knowledge with timely notifications.

OTHER FEATURES
• Cloud Sync* & Daily Backups – Sync between your iOS devices so your library is always up-to-date, or restore from previous backups.
• App Icons – Make Bookshelf your own with beautiful custom home-screen icons.
• Library Export* – Never fear losing your books or notes with CSV library exports.
• Dark Mode – Beautiful during the day, gorgeous and eye-saving at night.

*Some features require Bookshelf Gold for access or unlimited use
Gold Lifetime charges your Apple ID once for permanent Gold status. Gold Yearly charges your Apple ID for 12 months of Gold status after a 7-day free trial unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the trial ends. Gold Monthly charges your Apple ID for 1 month of Gold status on purchase confirmation.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. For more information, see our Terms and Conditions at bit.ly/2NNm93Z and Privacy Policy at bit.ly/31Mad8s.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements, including a critical issue affecting the Discover page.

As always, I love hearing from you—tell me what you’d like to see next via the in-app Feedback or Roadmap (find both in Stats → Settings). Happy reading!
