Gold Yearly charges your Apple ID for 12 months of Gold status after a 7-day free trial unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the trial ends. Gold Monthly charges your Apple ID for 1 month of Gold status on purchase confirmation.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. For more information, see our Terms and Conditions at bit.ly/2NNm93Z and Privacy Policy at bit.ly/31Mad8s.

apps.title: Gramedia Digital: eBook
apps.description:
Unlock Unlimited Reading with Gramedia Digital! 
Explore Indonesia's largest digital library, offering over 200,000 editions of bestselling books, popular magazines, and daily newspapers. From compelling fiction to insightful business, and children's content. Discover your next favorite read from hundreds of top publishers like Gramedia Pustaka Utama, HarperCollins, and Disney.
 
Why Gramedia Digital?
- Vast Content: Dive into an unparalleled collection of digital magazines, books, and newspapers from Indonesia and around the globe (Philippines, Malaysia, Singapore, Japan, India, Brazil, UK).
- Premium "All You Can Read": Subscribe for unlimited access to thousands of exclusive bestseller books and popular magazines. Start your reading journey without limits!
 
Key Features for a Superior Reading Experience:
- Seamless Discovery: Easily search, filter, and explore our extensive store for popular titles.
- Read Anywhere, Anytime: Download and read offline. Pick up older editions you missed.
- Personalized Reading: Customize with theme, font style, bookmarks, and note taking.
- Family Friendly: Utilize parental controls for shared devices.
- Local Currency Pricing: Enjoy transparent pricing based on your country.
 
Highlights from Our Collection:
- Magazines: GATRA, TEMPO, Cosmopolitan, Motor Trend, SWA, and more!
- Newspapers: Harian Kompas, Jawa Pos, Sindo, Tribun, and leading regional titles.
- Books: Thousands of titles from diverse genres by renowned publishers.
 
Important Subscription Information: Your Premium Package subscription auto-renews unless turned off 24 hours before the period ends. Manage or cancel via App Store Account settings. No cancellation during active period. Free trial portion forfeited upon subscription purchase.
 
Additional Information: Gramedia Digital is free to download with some free content available. In-app purchases can be disabled in your device settings. Minimum age 17. Network connection required for download and use.
Gramedia Digital is proud to be part of the Kompas Gramedia Group.

apps.title: inDrive. Save on city rides
apps.description:
inDrive, formerly known as inDriver, is a revolutionary ride-share application that boasts a presence in over 888 cities across 48 countries. Best of all, it’s completely free to use!

We're a new kind of rideshare app. We started up from scratch in 2013, and since then we've grown like crazy all around the world.
And now we're bringing our game-changing rides to the USA!

It’s an excellent taxi alternative for your trip. You can either find a ride or offer your own driving services through the app, making it super convenient and flexible. inDrive is a great ride-sharing option for rides in Miami. 

MORE CONTROL
Set the price you're happy to pay for rides and choose the driver you want to take you

FAIR PRICES
Our rides are cheaper because we don't charge drivers big fees

SAFETY FIRST
Vetted drivers, in-app safety features and a dedicated 24/7 support team

As a driver, you have the potential to earn more than a traditional cab driver using a standard transportation app. This is because you have the flexibility to create your own transport schedule and select which rides you wish to take.

Why Choose inDrive (a ride app or a driving app)

LOW SERVICE PAYMENTS FOR DRIVERS

We keep our service payments as low as we can, and they'll actually be 0% for six months from our launch.
We think it’s fairer this way. To us, you’re not just another driver who should simply take the rides we give you at the price we decide — no way, you're one of the team. 

QUICK AND EASY

Requesting an affordable ride is quick and easy with this ride-share app. Simply enter your starting point (A) and your destination (B), set your desired fare and select a driver to get started.

OFFER YOUR PRICE

We understand that finding a reliable and affordable ride can be a stressful experience. That’s why we want to offer you an alternative to traditional cab booking apps. With inDrive, you have the power to customize your rideshare experience. You can choose the driver you feel most comfortable with and set the price that works best for you. 

CHOOSE YOUR DRIVER

With inDrive, you have the power to select your driver from a list of those who have accepted your ride request. In addition, unlike other taxi booking apps, we offer you the freedom to choose based on factors such as price, car model, arrival time, rating, and the number of trips completed. This unique feature sets us apart as a preferred alternative to traditional cab apps.

STAY SAFE

Before accepting a ride, you can view the driver’s name, car model, license plate number, and the number of completed trips. This level of transparency is not standard in traditional taxi apps. Additionally, our app includes a “Share Your Ride” button, allowing you to share your trip details with family or friends. Our team is dedicated to developing new safety features to ensure a completely secure experience for both riders and drivers.

ADD EXTRA OPTIONS

By using this alternative taxi application, you have the option to include any specific requirements or additional information in the comments section, such as “traveling with my pet” or “carrying luggage.” The driver will be able to view this information on their driving app before deciding to accept your request.

JOIN AS A DRIVER & MAKE EXTRA MONEY

If you own a car, you can make extra money with our driving app. Unlike other cab booking apps, inDrive lets you view the passenger’s destination and price before accepting the ride. If the price seems inadequate, inDrive offers the option to suggest an alternative price or decline the ride request without penalties. Moreover, this car booking app has low-to-no service rates, meaning you can make more money while driving with this taxi app alternative.

Whether you are looking for a new driver app for your trip or need a ride in Miami, you can get a unique rideshare experience with this great cabs & taxi alternative. Install inDrive (inDriver) to ride & drive on your terms!

raw_data.releaseNotes: In this update, we’ve fixed some bugs and made small improvements to create a better experience for you. If you run into a bug, please let us know. We are happy to get your feedback and work on it in our future releases.

apps.title: أبجد: كتب - روايات - قصص عربية
apps.description:
Abjjad is the first of it’s kind reading app in the Arab world, offering you the best reading experience on your phone with the feel of the paper book in your hands. Now you can say goodbye to poor quality pdf books, with a library of over 20000 Arabic books and novels to choose from, we have everything, from new releases to the most popular book titles. 

Why Abjjad?

• With Abjjad you can read as many books as you like from a library packed with 20000+ Arabic books and novels for the price of 1 paper book. 

• Save up your internet data. Download books from the app to your phone within seconds & read offline wherever you go. 

• New books are added all the time. We are constantly working with new publishers to add more books and grow our library. 

• Don’t miss out on the feel of the paper book in your hands. With Abjjad you can flip the pages of the book and highlight the parts you like.. reading on your phone has never felt this natural. 

• Night mode feature for less eye strain and easier, comfortable reading.

• Connect with other readers. With a community of over 1.5 million readers, you can enjoy reading reviews and quotes written by others and comment or add your own.

• Follow your favorite writers & stay up-to-date with their latest published books.

• Create your own personal library by categorizing and adding books to your reading shelves.

• Our intuitive app is extremely easy to use, and provides you with the ability to highlight, bookmark & add notes inside the book.

• We strive to meet the tastes of all Arab readers, our library includes books of different genres like: stories, novels, biographies, literature, philosophy, psychology, history, politics, religion, self help books, etc.


How can you use Abjjad?

• Free Subscription:
Limited access to a number of books

• Abjjad Unlimited:
Unlimited access to all books on Abjjad (over 28000 books) for the price of 1 paper book. 

• Need help or got questions? We are always happy to hear from you on feedback@abjjad.com

Abjjad Unlimited Legal Details:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Subscription will be automatically renewed every 1 month unless canceled
• Privacy policy: https://www.abjjad.com/static/privacy
• Terms & conditions:https://www.abjjad.com/static/terms
• Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Bookist
apps.description:
Bookist helps you find new books to read based on what you have read, your genre preferences and careful curation.

1.  We'll suggest books to you based on your preferences - swipe right if you like a book and left if you don't
2.  Import your goodreads shelves in seconds
3.  Browse stacks of carefully curated books organised by genre, prizewinners, bookclub recommendations etc.
4.  Browse stacks of books inspired by your favourite reads.
5.  Build shelves of books you’ve read and books you want to read.
6.  Rate and review the books you have read.
7.  Search for books you have read to add them to your “I have read this” shelf to keep track of your reading.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Improved review cards and library imports
- Series are now clickable and searchable
- Privacy and security enhancements
- Bug fixes  and performance improvements

We're a small team of friendly people who are on a mission to help our community find books they'll love. If you enjoy using Bookist, please leave us a review. If you need help, you can contact us on info@bookist.app

Trusted by over 3 million golfers, the GolfNow App is the best way to book amazing deals on tee times at thousands of golf courses. Free golf GPS and golf rangefinder, scorekeeping and post-game analysis included.

Get the best deals on tee times
• Tee times available at over 6,000 golf courses worldwide.
• Search Hot Deal tee times to find incredible savings and discounts on our best prices on tee times. Includes weather protection.
• Get free golf faster with GolfNow  Rewards. Automatically earn points on every round.
• Join GolfPass and receive offers, unmatched benefits and savings, including waived convenience fees.

The easiest way to book your next round 
• Book tee times instantly 24/7 - No calling or waiting.
• Thousands of reviews from actual golfers to help you find the best golf courses.
• Thousands of detailed course information available to help you choose the right golf course for you.

apps.title: Chatbooks Family Photo Albums
apps.description:
Your memories deserve to be enjoyed, not trapped on your phone! The Chatbooks app makes it easy (like 10-minutes-or-less easy!) to turn them into personalized photo books and photo prints, delivered right to your door with free standard shipping.

Our bestselling Monthbooks photo book subscription makes it easier than ever to turn your everyday moments into a stunning photo book collection. Simply choose your delivery schedule, cover style, and photo book size to get started. The best part? It only takes 5 minutes to print each 30-60 page photo book. Add photos right from your phone camera roll in the Chatbooks app, edit, and send to print in just a few taps. Cancel anytime and always enjoy free shipping on any Chatbooks photo book subscription.

Need to print life’s big milestones, or give a meaningful personalized gift? Our Classic Photo Books are the perfect custom photo books. Simply select your size (6x6", 8x8", or 10x10"), cover type (softcover or hardcover), and chic cover color, or browse hundreds of designer covers. Add up to 366 pages of memories by uploading photos from your phone, then edit your book by easily adding collages, captions, and more. 

We’ve got you covered with our Love Chatbooks Guarantee and Toddler Insurance—so whether it’s a printing issue or a juice spill, we’ll make it right. 

You make the memories. We’ll help you print them. 

Millions of Chatbookers use the Chatbooks app to print their photos—join them today!

apps.title: Jeeny - Book Affordable Rides
apps.description:
Looking for affordable, reliable and convenient rides? Meet Jeeny, your affordable ride-hailing app!

Whether you're heading to work, meeting friends, or exploring your city, Jeeny is your ultimate buddy for budget-friendly rides, and awesome ride-hailing adventures in Saudi Arabia and Jordan!
With a simple tap, you can book your ride with Jeeny and enjoy comfortable and affordable rides to your destination. 

Say goodbye to complicated commutes and hello to seamless rides with Jeeny. Our focus is on providing you with exceptional service, safety and affordability, making every ride a hassle-free experience.

Why choose Jeeny for your rides?
Affordable pricing for everyday rides.
Quick and reliable pickups wherever you are.
A user-friendly app designed to make ride-hailing effortless. 

Download the Jeeny app now and let your rides become part of the easiest, most enjoyable part of your day. Jeeny, the best way to go!

The Services We Provide

Jeeny EcoLite
Enjoy quick and affordable rides with our Jeeny EcoLite service.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Smart
Jeeny Smart provides you with reliable and convenient rides tailored to your needs.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Elite
Indulge in luxurious rides that prioritize your comfort when you choose Jeeny Elite.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Economy
Choose Jeeny's Economy option for affordable, safe, and convenient rides.
(Available in Jordan)

Download the latest version of the Jeeny app now and explore the best way to go! Unparalleled affordability, 24-hour availability, and utter convenience - because the way you ride matters to Jeeny.

For more information, follow Jeeny on social media.

Whether you're heading to work, meeting friends, or exploring your city, Jeeny is your ultimate buddy for budget-friendly rides, and awesome ride-hailing adventures in Saudi Arabia and Jordan!
With a simple tap, you can book your ride with Jeeny and enjoy comfortable and affordable rides to your destination. 

Say goodbye to complicated commutes and hello to seamless rides with Jeeny. Our focus is on providing you with exceptional service, safety and affordability, making every ride a hassle-free experience.

Why choose Jeeny for your rides?
Affordable pricing for everyday rides.
Quick and reliable pickups wherever you are.
A user-friendly app designed to make ride-hailing effortless. 

Download the Jeeny app now and let your rides become part of the easiest, most enjoyable part of your day. Jeeny, the best way to go!

The Services We Provide

Jeeny EcoLite
Enjoy quick and affordable rides with our Jeeny EcoLite service.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Smart
Jeeny Smart provides you with reliable and convenient rides tailored to your needs.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Elite
Indulge in luxurious rides that prioritize your comfort when you choose Jeeny Elite.
(Available in KSA)

Jeeny Economy
Choose Jeeny's Economy option for affordable, safe, and convenient rides.
(Available in Jordan)

Download the latest version of the Jeeny app now and explore the best way to go! Unparalleled affordability, 24-hour availability, and utter convenience - because the way you ride matters to Jeeny.

For more information, follow Jeeny on social media.

X: https://x.com/jeenyksa?lang=en 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jeenyjo/?hl=en 

Jeeny, the best way to go!

apps.title: Omio: Book Train, Bus & Flight
apps.description:
Travel Booking Made Easy: Compare and Book Train, Bus, Flight and Ferry tickets with Omio!

Omio makes planning your next trip easy. Compare and book train, ferry, flight, and bus tickets — all in one place!
Whether you're planning to travel by train with Amtrak, booking a bus trip with FlixBus, flying with American Airlines, or taking a ferry with P&O, Omio makes travel easy. With access to over 45 countries and more than 2,000 trusted transport providers, booking tickets for your next trip has never been simpler!

And we’re not stopping there—you can now use the Omio app to book buses and flights in Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore and Vietnam. Not only are we launching South East Asia, but we’re also venturing into South America, offering buses and flights in Brazil. So, as well as London to Paris and New York to Toronto, you can also book travel tickets from Kuala Lumpur to Singapore, São Paulo to Rio de Janeiro, and many more destinations worldwide.

Why Choose Omio?
All-in-One Travel: Book tickets for trains, buses, flights, or ferries and compare prices across top providers in Europe, the US and the UK's largest names like Greyhound, Deutsche Bahn, ÖBB and SNCF.
Easy to Use: Discover the best routes and book tickets effortlessly. Pay securely using Apple Pay, PayPal, SOFORT, Alipay, or credit card in USD, GBP or Euros, and receive mobile tickets directly on your phone.
Exclusive Discounts on Tickets: Students, frequent travellers, and more can enjoy discounts on tickets through special offers, referral programs, and loyalty cards.
Live Updates: Get real-time updates for train times, bus times, and more. Track your train status for US travels, Trenitalia, Renfe, SNCF, Deutsche Bahn & more.
Mobile Tickets: Save time by adding your train, bus, flight and ferry tickets directly to the app. Skip the lines and get your ticket ready whenever you need it.
Support at the Palm of Your Hand: Omio provides 24/7 international customer service, ensuring you’re always covered, no matter where you are.

Travel with the best train providers:
Book train tickets with trusted providers across Europe and North America, including National Rail, Eurostar, SBB, SNCF, Trenitalia, Deutsche Bahn, Renfe, Italo, and Iryo.
Travel in the UK by train with Greater Anglia, GWR, LNER, ScotRail, Northern Rail and CrossCountry alongside Caledonian Sleeper, Heathrow and Gatwick Express.
Travel across borders with NS International, SNCB, and ÖBB, or choose high-speed trains with OUIGO, VR Finland, SJ Sweden and Comboios de Portugal.
Plan your trips in North America by train with Amtrak or Via Rail.

Book bus tickets effortlessly:
Travel with major bus operators — National Express and FlixBus, as well as Eurolines, ALSA, Blablacar bus, RegioJet, Vy Buss, PKS, Avanza Bus, Rede Expressos, MarinoBus and Itabus.
Embark on North American bus trips with OurBus, Go Buses, and RedCoach.

Flight tickets in a few taps:
Discover flights with leading airlines such as Ryanair, EasyJet, British Airways, Wizz Air, Aer Lingus, Vueling, Lufthansa, American Airlines and United.

Sail smoothly on ferries:
Book ferry tickets with reliable operators like Balearia, Blue Star Ferries, Fast Ferries, GNV, Mobylines, NLG, Positano Jet and Snav, providing connections across Europe, and the UK.

With an impressive 4.7/5 rating on Trustpilot from over 1,500 reviews, Omio is the go-to platform for travellers looking for a reliable travel experience to plan your trip and book tickets.
If Omio has made your travels smoother, take a moment to leave a review!

Contact
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us at help.omio.com/hc/en-us

Stay Connected
Follow Omio for the latest travel updates, tips, and exclusive offers:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Omio
Instagram: https://instagram.com/Omio/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@omioglobal

apps.title: Instaread: Learn Something New
apps.description:
Quench your thirst of knowledge in record time! Instaread offers key insights from thousands of bestselling books. Available in audio & text. In 15 minutes.

● Get smarter in 15 min or less
● Thousands of professionally written titles & constantly growing
● Instaread Originals on important topics and people
● Available in text & audio
● 7-day free trial
● Beautiful and smart cover-illustrations
● Download content to read/listen offline
● Save to your library


Titles include:
‘Getting Things Done’ by David Allen
‘The 4-Hour Workweek’ by Tim Ferriss
‘The Untethered Soul’ by Michael A. Singer
‘The 5 Second Rule’ by Mel Robbins
‘Good to Great’ by James C. Collins
‘Blink’ by Malcolm Gladwell
‘Unshakeable’ by Tony Robbins
‘Eat Fat Get Thin’ by Mark Hyman
and thousands more!

ONLY THE BEST NONFICTION BOOKS
● Only the absolute best books make it into our app.
● Highly curated content ensures useful learning and avoids waste of time.

INSTAREAD ORIGINALS
● “Success Stories”: A series on leadership in business, politics, and the arts.
● “Short Cuts”: Today’s hottest topics distilled.

CREATED BY PROFESSIONALS
● Subject-matter experts extract key insights from books and craft Instaread Originals.
● Multiple professionals including writers, editors, voice actors & artists carefully craft every Intaread to perfection.
● All content is fact-checked for accuracy & quality.

IMPROVE YOURSELF & STAY INFORMED
● Unlock the knowledge from the world’s greatest books & get access to profound ideas.
● Apply game changing ideas to improve important aspects of your life.
● Keep up-to-date with the latest developments in business, science, health, tech, history, culture & more.

AUDIO & TEXT
● All Instareads are available in text and in audio.
● On the road, at the gym or at home cooking? Use the audio feature to multi-task.
● Switch between audio & text effortlessly.
● Read & listen at the same time.

ONLINE & OFFLINE
● Download any amount of Instareads to your device.
● Access content on the plane, train or any location with limited connectivity.


----------------------------------------------

In the Press

“...this cool service lets you read or listen to [...] highlights versions of hundreds of bestselling books.” CNET

“...a nearly instantaneous way of diving into a book, understanding its meaning and boiling down key takeaways – all in a matter of minutes.” TheNextWeb

“...[through this app] you can get expanded back-cover synopses complete with thematic takeaways to help you focus your reading list” Mashable
----------------------------------------------

Instaread offers two subscription options: Monthly subscription for $8.99/month (with first week FREE) and a Yearly subscription for $89.99/year (with first week FREE). Cancel subscription anytime. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period by going to your iOS Account Settings after purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price of the annual or monthly subscription depending on what is chosen. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you change from an annual to a monthly subscription or from a monthly to an annual subscription during the free trial period.

The privacy policy can be viewed at instaread.co/privacy. The terms of use can be viewed at instaread.co/terms.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: SideBooks
apps.description:
SideBooks is a high performance, high speed PDF viewer that allows you to enjoy reading with the feel of actual paper.

=Features=

Curl animation that simulates the actual turning of paper pages has been added to the standard page slide function.
Supports viewing from 3 directions, documents that open left to right, right to left and vertically. It provides the optimal environment for viewing any book.
All zoom rates have been optimized providing high speed, dynamic screen display.
An infinite hierarchy of folders can be created, moved, deleted, renamed, etc. using the enhanced bookshelf management function.
Real visual bookshelf function that corresponds to back cover style display.
Files can be imported by 3 methods, Network transfer through Dropbox, USB transfer through iTunes and direct transfer from other applications.
Books can be protected so others cannot view them by using the password protected locking function.
This is a universal application that operates on the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.


=Functions=

Overall:
*Brightness Adjustment
*Screen rotates to match the orientation of the device
*Screen Rotation Lock
*Password Protected Start-up Lock

Viewer:
*Support PDF,ZIP,CBZ,RAR and CBR format
*Page Turning: Choose from slide or curl
*Viewing Directions: Choose from opening left to right / right to left / vertically
*Page Spacing: Choose form wide / narrow / none
*Facing Pages: Choose the pair of facing pages by setting the cover to on or off
*Trim function within the range of page display
*Cache pre-read function for the previous and next pages
*Set the display for each book and remember the page number of the last page read
*Text search function (list display type)
*Contents function (also supports hierarchy type)
*Bookmark function (with editable memos)
*Edit handwritten notes
*Send to other applications (Open-In)
*Send by email
*Printing function (Air Print)
*In-page link function
*Link to outside URL function (built-in browser / Safari / Printing)
*Display / Don't Display link buttons
*Page turning function using tap or swipe
*Expansion / Contraction function using pinch and double tap (1-1024x zoom)
*Viewing of encrypted PDF files with password protection
*Display / non-display of statusbar when reading

Bookshelf:
*Display form: Choose form list bookshelf / visual bookshelf
*Function to set theme of visual bookshelf with each folder
*Bookshelf thema extension pack (Add-On)
*Cover editing function (corresponds to the trim)
*File editing function: create, move, delete, setting for all books in folder
*Bookmark list
*Reading history list
*Unread list
*Edit of mark choose form already read / unread
*Book name search function
*Network transfer through Dropbox
*USB transfer through iTunes
*Direct transfer from other applications

Special thanks to, 
"Give My Regards to Black Jack"
SHUHO SATO
Manga on Web
http://mangaonweb.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: *Minor bug fixes.

apps.title: Air India: Book Flight Tickets
apps.description:
Welcome to the Air India app – Winner of the 2024 Gold Stevie Award

Easily book flights, manage trips, receive timely check-in reminders and gate notifications – the new and improved Air India app is designed to make your journeys simpler and enjoyable. With just a few swipes, you can instantly access your flight details, complete web check-ins, do flight upgrades and much more. Download the app now and start enjoying a faster and seamless flight booking experience!

You can make use of our updated app to complete quick flight searches, flight bookings and stay informed about the latest updates concerning your travel from anywhere. Our app is designed to work on mobile phones of all resolutions and has been awarded with a Gold Stevie Award at the 2024 Asia-Pacific Stevie Awards, for its excellence in innovation and customer service. 

Easy flight bookings:

Now you can book domestic and international flights to more than 450 destinations all over the world with just a few taps. Discover the best places to visit, the right prices and even the perfect schedule by narrowing down your options based on your preferences and needs. 

Stay updated on the go:

Stay current with all the major updates related to your domestic and international flights on the go. Whether there is a change in gate number or departure time, your digital boarding pass will be automatically updated to display the change in boarding details or departure time.

AEYE VISION™:
Use the new scan function to add details of your journeys to the My Trips section, complete web check-in, track flight status and even monitor the status of your checked-in luggage right from drop off to pick up at the baggage claim.

Baggage tracker:
This handy feature makes it easy to keep tabs on the status of your baggage and its location in case of delays, allowing you to minimise your worries and focus more on enjoying the travel experience.

Flight status:
Track the status of your scheduled flights easily with this handy feature, allowing you stay organised and ready for your next big adventure.

Maharaja Club programme:
Members of our Maharaja Club programme can use the app to access and manage their loyalty accounts, allowing them to redeem points for flight bookings and cabin class upgrades.

Digital boarding pass:
Go paperless by completing your check-in online and downloading your boarding pass to your device. You can store your boarding pass in your digital wallet for easy retrieval.

Inflight experience:
Use the app to explore our assorted inflight dining menu, offering everything from the classics to delicious gourmet creations. Also, don't forget to have a look at what we have in store from the world of cinema, television, and music to keep you entertained.

Book flights on Airbus A350-900:
Search and book domestic or international flights on an Airbus A350-900 personalised with an elegant and luxurious interior. 

AI.g:
Our app allows you to connect with our virtual agent AI.g, available round the clock to offer expert assistance. From checking flight status and confirming baggage allowance to rebooking and refunds, our AI virtual assistant can answer all your queries about flying with Air India.

Trip planner:
Our virtual agent's trip planner feature helps you create customised itineraries for your dream destinations, highlighting places to visit, shopping spots, and local culinary delights. 

About Air India:
Founded by the legendary JRD Tata, Air India pioneered India’s aviation sector and is one of the leading global airlines. We are the proud flag carrier of India, and a member of the Star Alliance. Air India’s direct and nonstop international flights connect India with destinations in Asia, Africa, Australia, Europe, the Middle East, and North America.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re pleased to bring you a set of useful updates and improvements to your mobile app:
   - Redesigned Live Activity screens with a cleaner layout and added details.
   - Updated tier upgrade section with clearer guidance.
   - Implemented backend changes to improve stability and performance.

apps.title: Bookey: Book Ideas for Growth
apps.description:
Level up your life with the top book's key ideas and quotes. Bookey brings the 30 min key insights from the world bestsellers to boost your personal growth and explore your potential.

We unlock the big ideas from selected books that cover Personal Development, Biography, Leadership, Art, Business, and more. Each title is complemented with a mind map that highlights the essence of the book, allowing you to grasp the gist of the book at a glance. We are committed to offering a fresh way of learning and promoting universal access to knowledge. 

●How Does Bookey Make Your Life Easier?
Audio versions for hands-free learning
Mind map for each book
Download mode for learning without Wi-Fi
12 categories to cover all non-fiction field
Books recommended by Bill Gates, New York Times and more 
No extra time needed only 30 mins for summaries
Non-stressed notification system to disturb you.

●What Do Readers Love About Bookey?
“This app really got me reading more every night before going to bed. I like the variety of books and mind map! By the way, the content is longer than Blinkist and Headway.” — Alan

"A fantastic way to open up your mind to new authors who you wouldn’t have tried otherwise. It is just the right thing for my busy lifestyle " — Henry

“This app is amazingly easy to me because I can't really read when working or drive; however I can listen all day long at night. Specially Bookey help me improve my performance at work.” — Ashley

●How To Start With Bookey：
Download the Bookey app now and sign up for a free 7-day trial. We offer Yearly and Monthly Premium by subscription.

●With Bookey Premium:
unlimited access to all titles with full audio and text
unlimited access to mind map of each title
use smart library collect your favorite titles
download mode save the data plan 

Cancel subscription any time. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period in your iTunes Account settings. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price of the annual or monthly subscription depending on what is chosen. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you change from an annual to a monthly subscription or from a monthly to an annual subscription during the free trial period. 

If your are not ready for Premium service，you could still read or listen the opening section of each title.

apps.title: 4books: Audiobooks & Podcasts
apps.description:
More than 1 million people read, listen, and learn the key concepts of the best books, audiobooks and podcasts every day on 4books in more than 15 different categories (business, psychology, investments, leadership, history ...).

Start expanding your knowledge in just 15 minutes with the best books, audiobooks, and podcasts in Italian.

Choose the content you want to read, or listen to in audiobook format.

4books is the mobile app that enables you to listen to exclusive audiobooks, news, and podcasts and learn effortlessly, while doing other activities. On 4books you will also find news, current events, and tools that will help you stay up to date with what’s going on in the world.

BECOME MORE KNOWLEDGEABLE AND LEARN THE KEY CONCEPTS OF A SELECTION OF THE BEST BOOKS IN THE WORLD

- Listen to the best bits from our titles selected from the world international bestseller charts. Choose from more than 15 categories of audiobooks.
- Choose whether to enhance your knowledge on business, marketing, finance or even psychology, mindfulness, startups and much more, with our collection of books, podcasts, and audiobooks.
- Decide whether to read one of the many books in our library, or listen to the audiobook version.
- Explore our archive, made up of hundreds of books hand-selected by our team put together by our founder, Marco Montemagno.
- Read content directly on all your devices. Need to put your reading on pause? No problem, on 4books you can pick up directly from where you left off, at any time.

DISCOVER EXCLUSIVE PODCASTS READ DIRECTLY BY OUR PROFESSIONAL ACTORS

- You can find exclusive podcasts on hot topics or concepts to learn while having fun.
- Our selection is constantly updated, and includes in-depth studies on philosophy, geopolitics, neuroscience, and many more.

STAY UP TO DATE ON KEY STORIES FROM THE DAILY NEWS

- In 4books you can listen to the key stories from the daily news wherever you are.
- We offer a roundup of world news in our international press review, also available in Italian.
- Choose to receive the daily newsletter or to read your updates on the 4books app.
DON’T HOLD YOURSELF BACK
- Learning has no limits with 4books. Learn where and when you want with our audiobooks, podcasts, and written books analyses. Use 4books from a mobile or from the web and access content in audio or text format. 
- Take the 4books app to the gym, on vacation, while you're in the car or out walking the dog. Learn quickly, wherever you are, thanks to our audio books available in short summaries.
- As soon as you find the book that's right for you, you can download it offline, so you can use it even when you don't have a data connection. You can also take notes and create your own library of favourites.

Terms and Conditions of Use
https://www.4books.com/en/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy
https://4books.com/en/privacy

apps.title: IHG One Rewards: Book Hotels
apps.description:
Book hotels and earn rewards at 6,600+ destinations worldwide with the IHG One Rewards mobile app — voted “Best in Travel” by The Webby Awards. 
 
Whether you're looking for a last-minute hotel deal, a luxury resort, or a family-friendly hotel, the IHG One Rewards app makes it easy to: 
- Book hotels quickly and securely 
- Find hotel deals near you 
- Earn and redeem rewards 
- Check out easily  
- Access amenities and trip info 
 
IHG Hotels & Resorts: 6,600+ destinations. 20 hotel brands. 1 app. 
Earn rewards when you book with any of our hotel brands from the IHG One Rewards app. From family stays at Holiday Inn hotels to business-ready accommodations at Crowne Plaza and luxury resorts like Iberostar, there’s a hotel for every type of traveler. 
 
Book a hotel in seconds 
Save your favorite hotels to Wishlists and filter by rate, distance, or amenities to plan your next getaway.

Connect to free Wi-Fi fast 
IHG Wi-Fi Auto Connect allows you to automatically connect to free and fast internet upon arrival. 
 
Check out in the app 
Skip the front desk with our easy digital checkout process. When you’re done, just leave your keys in the room. You can also review your bill right from the app. 
 
Manage every detail of your trip 
Discover nearby restaurants and shops, explore the area around your hotel, modify or cancel a reservation, and get directions and parking info — all from the app! 
 
Earn and enjoy hotel rewards 
Keep track of your rewards progress, and access exclusive member rates and Milestone Rewards like room upgrades and bonus points to use on future stays. Also, you can combine points and cash to book your next room. 

Travel with ease 
Enjoy flexible hotel bookings and free cancellations on most rates. Receive travel updates, contact our customer care representatives, and rely on best-in-class cleaning protocols.  
 
Download the IHG One Rewards app today to find and book hotels, manage your travel, and earn rewards. 

-Images are illustrative and may not reflect what is live in the app
-Prices are illustrative and may not reflect what is live in the app

apps.title: Zocdoc - Find and book doctors
apps.description:
Zocdoc is the leading healthcare app that makes it easy for you to find and book the right doctor. Each month, millions of people use Zocdoc to search for in-network care and instantly book appointments online. 

Whether you need a doctor on demand or want to schedule a doctor appointment online, Zocdoc makes it fast and easy. Patients typically see a doctor within 24 to 72 hours of booking. 

Download the FREE Zocdoc app to find and book a doctor today.

WHY PATIENTS LOVE ZOCDOC

Zocdoc makes it easy to go from searching to scheduling in just a few taps.

- Search by your insurance and city to find in-network doctors near you
- Browse by specialty, availability, or procedure to get the care you need
- Filter by what matters to you: distance, gender, ratings, and more
- Read real, verified reviews from other patients
- See providers' real-time appointment availability
- Easily book in-person or telehealth visits that fit your schedule
- Get automatic reminders so you never miss an appointment
- Fill out your forms ahead of time, so your visit starts smoothly

POPULAR CARE OPTIONS

Zocdoc connects patients to nearly 100,000 providers across more than 250 specialties. You can book an online doctor for a virtual visit, schedule urgent care, book in-person care near you, or find providers who accept Medicare plans.

Looking to schedule a dental cleaning, therapy appointment, or Rx refill? Zocdoc helps you book the appointment you need, from routine visits to specialized care.

Here are just a few of the most popular services patients book through the app:

- Dentist: Dental cleanings, checkups, and x-rays
- Therapist: Therapy sessions for mental health support
- Primary Care Doctor: Annual checkups and physicals
- OB-GYN: Pap smears and women’s health visits
- Dermatologist: Skin checks and acne consultations
- Psychiatrist: Medication management and evaluations
- Pediatrician: Wellness visits and sick appointments for kids
- Eye Doctor: Vision exams and prescription updates
- Orthopedic Specialist: Joint pain, injuries, and sports medicine
- Cardiologist: Heart health screenings and follow-ups

There are many more specialties and procedures you can book with Zocdoc. Your healthcare, on your terms.

INSURANCE PLANS ACCEPTED

Zocdoc makes it easy to find doctors who accept your insurance, with no phone calls or guesswork required. Here are some of the most commonly accepted insurance plans on Zocdoc.

- Cigna
- UnitedHealthcare
- Aetna
- Kaiser Permanente
- Blue Cross Blue Shield
- Anthem
- Humana
- Oscar Health
- Molina Healthcare
- Healthfirst

Doctors on Zocdoc accept over 18,000 different insurance plans, making it easy to find in-network care. No matter what plan you have, Zocdoc helps you see what's in-network and book care confidently.

HOW TO BOOK AND MANAGE CARE WITH ZOCDOC

Search and compare.
Search by specialty or symptom, along with location, availability, and insurance, to see providers who are in-network. Research and compare providers by reviewing their profiles, which include professional statements, education background, photos, and verified reviews and ratings from other patients.

Instantly book.
View providers’ real-time appointment availability, select a convenient time, and click to instantly book an appointment, 24/7.

Prepare for your appointment.
Save time by filling out intake forms and insurance information on Zocdoc ahead of the visit.

Stay on top of your healthcare.
Keep track of upcoming visits with appointment reminders and personalized recommendations for preventive care. View your care team and easily rebook.

From search to follow-up, Zocdoc makes it simple to manage your care from one place.

apps.title: Hertz Rental Car, EV, SUV, Van
apps.description:
Book a car rental with the new and improved Hertz Rent-a-Car iPhone App. Pick your rental car from our extensive selection, including economy cars, electric cars, SUVs, vans, and even sports cars! Explore all the options to your heart’s content in our new iOS App!

Whether you are traveling for business, or going on a family vacation, you can save time, get on the road faster, and unlock the power to reserve, modify, and review your reservations with a few swipes of your finger! Spend less time in lines so you can get to your destination quicker! Our free Hertz App has added flexibility, to make sure that your car rental experience is quick, easy, and always meets your needs!!
Download the Hertz® App to get immediate access to:
• Search for rental cars and Hertz locations in popular cities.
• Use the Map-view to browse rental car availability at multiple Hertz locations.
• Skip the hassle of other car rental apps with Hertz’s one-touch log-in and easy browsing experience.
• Rent a car with our easy checkout, you’ll be done in seconds.
• Enjoy effortless mobile navigation with menus.
• Pick up where you left off, by using your previous searches.
• Get access to exclusive offers and content with Hertz Gold Plus Rewards®.
• And much more…

What benefits do you get with the Hertz Gold Plus Rewards program?
• Earn Hertz Rewards points, unlock perks, and score exclusive benefits to earn free rental car days, free upgrades, and more.
• Sign up is 100% free, helping you start earning rewards faster.
• Enjoy a personalized in-app experience with your name, member number, status, and rewards points balance all in one convenient location.
• See upcoming reservations at log-in or access your complete Hertz car rental history to make new bookings and help you complete expense reports.
• Easily review or modify upcoming car rentals with a few swipes.
• Redeem, request, and exchange Hertz Rewards points to pay for your car rental directly from the app.
• Save, modify, and update your preferred payment method with ease - Store work and personal credit cards to make everything super easy!

Did You Know?

As a result of creating top-tier customer experiences, Hertz was honored with several loyalty awards in 2020 and 2021.

Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was voted 9-time winner for Best Car Rental Rewards Program in 2020 by FlyerTalk and 8-time winner for the Best Travel and Loyalty Program – Women’s Choice Award in 2021. Additionally, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was awarded Platinum status for Customer Loyalty Innovation and Transformation, and Silver status for Technology and Trends by Loyalty360 in 2021.
Thank you for being the motivation for Hertz to achieve these great awards:

• Women’s Choice Award – Best Car Rental Loyalty Program
• Ethisphere Institute Award - World’s Most Ethical Company - 2020
• Recommend Readers’ Choice Award – Best Car Rental Company (9x Winner)
• FlyerTalk Awards – Best Car Rental Loyalty Program (8x Winner)
• AAA Discounts and Rewards – Outstanding AAA Partner of the Year (2x Winner)
• Trazee Awards – Favorite Car Rental Company
• Global Traveler Award – Best Car Rental Company (6x Winner)
• Bitacora Award – Best National Car Rental Company (7x Winner)
• Annual World Travel Awards – Favorite Car Rental Company
• And many more.

Learn More About Hertz Car Rental:
Hertz is much more than a car rental company. Our business prides itself on dedication to customers' changing needs by offering a wide variety of vehicles and services. We boast a rich history of significant first steps, ambitious ideas and innovation that has formed our company into the reputable brand it is today.

Discover why millions of customers every year choose Hertz to rent a car.

Did You Know?

As a result of creating top-tier customer experiences, Hertz was honored with several loyalty awards in 2020 and 2021.

Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was voted 9-time winner for Best Car Rental Rewards Program in 2020 by FlyerTalk and 8-time winner for the Best Travel and Loyalty Program – Women’s Choice Award in 2021. Additionally, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was awarded Platinum status for Customer Loyalty Innovation and Transformation, and Silver status for Technology and Trends by Loyalty360 in 2021.
Thank you for being the motivation for Hertz to achieve these great awards:

• Women’s Choice Award – Best Car Rental Loyalty Program

• Recommend Readers’ Choice Award – Best Car Rental Company (9x Winner)

• Bitacora Award – Best National Car Rental Company (7x Winner)
• Annual World Travel Awards – Favorite Car Rental Company
• And many more.

Learn More About Hertz Car Rental:
Hertz is much more than a car rental company. Our business prides itself on dedication to customers' changing needs by offering a wide variety of vehicles and services. We boast a rich history of significant first steps, ambitious ideas and innovation that has formed our company into the reputable brand it is today.

apps.title: Yestory - Read Books & Booktok
apps.description:
Yestory – An app for unlimited reading of Web Stories
Immerse yourself in a world of captivating stories —from royal romance to urban fantasy, werewolf sagas to billionaire romances, Yestory brings your favorite romance and fantasy stories to life with daily updates and heart-racing plots.
- Rich Book Genres: Romance, Werewolf, Fantasy, Billionaire, Mafia, Mystery, Science Fiction and more.
- Popular Books: Read popular books recommended by Booktok.



Why Do Readers Choose Yestory?
Yestory has collected popular web stories and ebook, provides you with the latest chapters of the highest quality. This is a must-have book app for the majority of web stories lovers.
- Affordable, with many free-to-read chapters and daily rewards.
- Simple, elegant interface designed for immersive and comfortable reading.
- You can easily dive into popular books recommended on BookTok.



Fast Daily Updates
- We have a professional team of writers to ensure fast and high-quality updates every week, so your reading journey never comes to a halt.
- Popular web novels are uploaded every week, with personalized recommendations based on your reading preferences.

Your Reading, Your Way
- Effortlessly switch between Day and Night modes for the most comfortable reading anytime.
- Adjust font size, font style, background color, and page layout freely. Yestory lets you read the way you love, with your preferences saved across all your devices.



Community of reading/writing enthusiasts
Whether you like writing novels or reading novels, Yestory has you covered:
- For authors, there is greater exposure, allowing more people to read your work. Publishing will not just be a dream.
- For readers, you can enjoy the ultimate reading experience, as well as imaginative works, and you can also communicate with many fans



Yestory’s Recommended Popular Books
“My Alpha and Pup Chose His Mistress” - she watches in heartbreak as her beloved Alpha and their pup choose another woman as his mate.
“From CEO Mute Wife to Business Queen” - She was once the mute wife of a powerful CEO, but now she rises to rule the business world with unmatched brilliance.
“The Luna He Betrayed Became Every Alpha’s Dream” - After being betrayed by her mate, a disgraced Luna rises from ashes, transforming into an irresistible icon coveted by every Alpha — leaving her former lover in agonizing regret.



Earn Rewards
Complete daily check-ins and reading tasks to easily earn rewards like points and special items. Level up, unlock more exciting content, and make your reading experience even more fun and comfortable！


Subscription：
*Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the period 
*You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto-renewal through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the period avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service 
*Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal


Download Yestory now and start your reading journey today!


Follow Us：
FB：Yestory Readers Club

Privacy Policy: https://download.yestory.cc/PrivacyPolicy.html

Terms Of Use: https://download.yestory.cc/TermsOfUse.html

apps.title: Friggy: 15 Min Book Summaries
apps.description:
DISCOVER FRIGGY – YOUR BOOK SUMMARY APP

Can’t find the time to read all the books on your list? Join thousands of readers who trust Friggy for quick and engaging summaries of the world’s best books. Whether you're into self-improvement, business, or the latest bestsellers, Friggy brings you clear, concise, and insightful summaries to keep you informed and inspired.
Our bite-sized summaries save you time, making it easy to absorb key insights from popular non-fiction books in just minutes. You’ll never miss out on the wisdom of the world's best authors.

UNLOCK THE POWER OF READING – WITHOUT THE TIME COMMITMENT

Friggy transforms complex ideas into easy-to-read summaries that capture the essence of each book. With just a few minutes a day, you can expand your knowledge and keep up with the latest trends in business, personal development, leadership, and more.

WHY CHOOSE FRIGGY?

 • HIGH-QUALITY BOOK SUMMARIES – Dive into expertly crafted summaries of bestsellers, top-rated self-help books, and groundbreaking research.
 • EASY-TO-READ AND UNDERSTAND – Our summaries break down complex topics into bite-sized, digestible content that you can read or listen to on the go.
 • WIDE RANGE OF CATEGORIES – From productivity and leadership to health and psychology, we cover a broad spectrum of subjects to match your interests.
 • FRESH CONTENT WEEKLY – With new book summaries added regularly, you’ll always have something new to explore and learn from.
 • SAVE TIME – Get key insights in under 15 minutes. Friggy helps you stay ahead of the curve, even with a busy schedule.
 • READ OR LISTEN – Enjoy the flexibility of reading or listening to your summaries, perfect for when you’re commuting, exercising, or multitasking.

START YOUR JOURNEY TO A SMARTER YOU

Download Friggy today and start boosting your knowledge in minutes. Whether you're looking for career growth, personal development, or just want to learn something new, Friggy makes it easy to stay sharp and informed.

WANT MORE THAN JUST SUMMARIES?

Friggy’s detailed insights go beyond the basic points, offering deeper analysis and actionable takeaways so you can apply what you learn directly to your life or work.

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

A Friggy subscription gives you full access to all available summaries, with new content added regularly.
Pricing may vary depending on your location, and we occasionally offer limited-time promotions. No refunds or price adjustments for previous purchases will be given for special offers.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current period ends.
Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: 
Privacy Policy: https://friggy.app/privacy-policy-1 
Terms of Use:  https://friggy.app/terms-and-conditions
Manage your subscription in your app store settings. You cannot cancel a subscription during the active period.




START LEARNING TODAY – DOWNLOAD FRIGGY NOW

Our new property partner app lets you keep Booking.com in your pocket. Manage your property easier and faster – plus keep your guests happy anywhere, anytime.

-Stay up-to-date on today’s arrivals, departures, new bookings, cancellations, modifications, and reviews

Interact with your guests in a few taps
- Stay in touch with live chat between you and guests
- Use pre-translated templates to quickly reply to frequent requests

- Update your availability on the go

apps.title: Serial Reader: Daily Book Bits
apps.description:
Read classic books in daily bite-sized bits! 

Serial Reader helps you fit more reading into your busy life. Choose from more than 900 books — or add your own! — and the app delivers a new issue from the book every day. Build great reading habits and tackle daunting classic books.

Each daily issue can be read in 20 minutes or less, making it easy to fit reading into your spare time! Picked as one of Apple's Best New Apps and Best New App Updates.

"This free app will make you ridiculously well-read in 20 minutes a day" — Mashable

"For those who are intimidated by thick, leather-bound tomes, Serial Reader is a good way to break it all down" — The Washington Post

• Read hundreds of popular classic books for free
• Large variety of themes & fonts
• Serialize your own EPUB books
• Sync to Goodreads and Readwise
• Lookup words with quick dictionary & Wikipedia access
• Earn fun badges and track your reading streaks

Plus, with the Serial Premium upgrade:

• Read tomorrow's issue early
• Sync your reading across multiple devices
• Save quotes & notes while reading
• Save books to Read Later
• Pause delivery of new issues
• Pick specific delivery days and hours for new issues
• Custom app icons

"Serial Reader’s subscription format makes it a little bit more fun to crank through the classics" — Lifehacker

"A useful tool that makes it easy in our modern world to make classic books part of your reading diet" — MacStories

More than 900 books available in the app with new titles added each week. Every book is free to read!

A preview of available books:

Most Popular

Adventure

Romance

apps.title: Next Big Idea: Books in 15min
apps.description:
Next Big Idea: The World’s Leading Book Summaries & Reading Club. Loved by Thousands of Life-long Learners Across the Globe. 

LEARN FROM THE AUTHORS THEMSELVES

Next Big Idea is the only app where you can read summaries written and spoken by the authors.

You won’t find these exclusive gold nuggets anywhere else.

FEATURED AUTHORS 

- Adam Grant 
- Malcolm Gladwell 
- Daniel Pink 
- Susan Cain 
- James Clear 
- Nir Eyal 
- And so many more HIGHLIGHTS 

• Book Bites — Listen to or read 15 minute book overviews, as created and recorded by the authors themselves. 100+ titles available!

• E-courses — 45 minute master classes, in audio, video and text formats starring the authors of the Next Big Idea’s best books of the year 

• Conversations — Watch recorded live Q&As, podcast recordings, and author chats 

• Next Big Idea Podcast — 45 minute ad-free episodes from our celebrated podcast 

• Idea of the day — 2 minute daily insights from leading thinkers 

• Exclusive Invitations – Receive invites to live author Q&As and book launches 

TESTIMONIALS

apps.title: Daily Book Summaries read note
apps.description:
Discover, Read, and Listen to the World's Best Book Summaries!

Welcome to Book Summaries World, your ultimate companion for quick, insightful, and engaging book summaries. Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or just a curious mind, Book Summaries brings you the essence of thousands of books, right at your fingertips.

Discover personalized suggestions under "Recommended For You" and stay updated with what's popular in "Trending Books." Save books for future reading, on-the-go read or listen, and get all the takeaways in a short time. Easily add or remove summaries to your reading list, and explore detailed previews of recommended and trending books and instantly resume your current active summaries. Organize and manage your saved summaries under "Saved for Later," and keep track of the summaries you've finished in the "Completed" section. Each book preview includes a concise overview of the book's content, key takeaways, and details about the author. Before reading have a look. Enjoy a smooth, uninterrupted reading experience and if you want  listen to the summary.

Bookworm Summaries is designed to help you maximize your learning and stay informed with high-quality book summaries. 

WHAT YOU GET WITH BOOK SUMMARIES

Quick Learning:
Summarized Insights: Dive into concise overviews of popular non-fiction books, extracting key concepts efficiently.
Daily Updates: Stay updated with fresh content and the latest trends in personal development and productivity.

Convenient Features:
Audio Summaries: Listen to key takeaways on-the-go for maximum flexibility and convenience.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive design that simplifies navigation and enhances your learning experience.

Personalized Experience:
Tailored Recommendations: Get book suggestions based on your interests to ensure the content is relevant and engaging.

Engaging Learning:
Interactive Content: Engage with summaries in various formats to find what suits you best and retain information more effectively.

Download now and start your journey to knowledge and growth!

Paid Subscribers can;
-Read limitless summaries,
-Listen limitless summaries,
-Simply access the summaries they have saved and pick up where they left off in the books they began reading.
-Easily filter summaries by category
-Search for books by book and author name.
-Access trending and recommended for you sections.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy : https://esimapp.notion.site/esimapp/Privacy-Policy-969b4a4f62b940fd82c4f188da2ce867

apps.title: Snapreads: Read More Books
apps.description:
Get key insights and takeaways from hundreds of best-selling nonfiction books you can read or listen to in just 15 minutes.

GET THE KEY INSIGHTS FROM HUNDREDS OF BESTSELLING NONFICTION BOOKS
• Dip your toe into new subjects and drink from the huge wealth of knowledge that’s out there, growing your knowledge in bite-size chunks.
• With expert analysis and key takeaways delivered in minutes, rather than spread out over snatched periods of quiet time in your hectic life.
• Broaden your horizons into whole new subjects or drill deep down into expert thought in your favorite area. Each 15-minute book summary opens the whole book to you effortlessly.
• Hundreds of thousands of books are published every year. Snapreads doesn’t just have a library of bestsellers from the past – we also curate the best books right here, right now, enabling you to keep up-to-date with the latest knowledge.

READ ON YOUR TIME OR LISTEN ON THE GO
• Choose what works for you: read when you’ve got time or listen to the audio to keep learning on the go.
• Switch between audio & text effortlessly.
• Learn handsfree on your way to work, at the gym or doing chores at home.

ENJOY READING RECOMMENDATIONS & PERSONALIZED LISTS JUST FOR YOU
• Never be at a loss for what to read next – our smart suggestion tool gives you ideas based on what you’ve already read.
• Be the smartest person at your next meeting with cutting-edge thoughts from leaders in business and economics – it almost feels like cheating!
• Discover what makes the successful, the rich, and the famous tick and enrich yourself with lessons that took them a lifetime to learn in just 15 minutes.
• Unlock your full potential with 15-minute wisdom that unleashes a smarter, better you in all areas of life – grow into the person you want to be.

HOW IT WORKS:

Using Snapreads is simple. Download the app now and sign up for the free 7-day trial. 

Snapreads offers two membership options: Monthly subscription for $14.99/month (First week free) and a yearly membership (First week free) for $89.99/year.

You can cancel at any time during your 7-day free trial via the iTunes store settings and you will not be charged. Plans automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the purchase of a subscription to that publication.

All details are in our terms of use and privacy policy.
https://snapreads.com/terms-of-use
https://snapreads.com/privacy-policy

We are constantly working hard on making the Snapreads app better and more useful for you. Please feel free to email us at vip@snapreads.co for any questions, suggestions or if you just want to say hi. We would love to hear from you.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

- Under-the-hood updates and squashed bugs for a better experience. 

We are always looking for ways to make Snapreads better for you. If you have any feedback or have a question, please contact us at snapreads.com/contact-us.

apps.title: ALL Accor - Hotel booking
apps.description:
The Best Hotels for the Perfect Stay!

Discover the convenience of the ALL Accor app, and the best offers for your travels. 

Here you can find the best hotel deals for you and your family, whether for business or leisure – hotels, hostels, resorts, and apartments ranging from budget to luxury. 

Accor provides a world of options in over 100 countries, spanning more than 3,000 cities and 5,000 destinations to explore with economy, premium and luxury hotels.

In total, there are 45 different brands, including Novotel, Pullman, Ibis, Sofitel, Mercure, Fairmont, JO&JOE, Grand Mercure, and many others. 

With the ALL Accor travel app, you can easily and securely book the best accommodation! 

Book your stay in a hotel or resort. If you're looking for the best price, in the ALL Accor app you will find discounts and budget-friendly hotels. And if you're traveling in a large group or looking for an extended stay, there's the option to find the perfect apartment.

With over 5,000 properties worldwide, you can choose the perfect hotel not only based on location and the number of guests but also by star rating, guest reviews, and available hotel services – all at your fingertips in our ALL.com app. 

Download the ALL Accor app and have a world of offers at your fingertips! 



• Prepare Your Stay
Find a place to stay in any destination worldwide or near a specific attraction, browse through room and space photos, and check TripAdvisor reviews. Enjoy your trip!



• Manage Your Reservation 
Track your bookings, manage your payment methods, edit your personal information, and check-in online. If you are a member of ALL, track your Reward points and progress towards the next status tier. 

You can book your hotel, manage your reservation, and prepare for your trip. In our app, you'll find all the information about the hotel and your stay. 



• ALL – Loyalty Program 
Sign up for free to our loyalty program ALL - Accor Live Limitless and enjoy hotel discounts of up to 10% on every reservation, year round with our members’ rate. 

Your stay generates Reward points at our hotels. Additionally, you can earn points at our restaurants and bars, even without a stay!

• Explore Destinations

Do you love to travel? In our app, you'll find the perfect place to stay in the most impressive cities worldwide: 

-North America: Canada, United States, and Mexico. 
-Europe: Paris, Lisbon, Germany, the United Kingdom, and more. 
-South America: Brazil, Chile, Peru, Argentina, Colombia, Bolivia, and many other destinations. 

Download the ALL Accor app and discover all our destinations, from Asia to the Pacific, Europe to the Americas, and anywhere in-between. Whether for leisure or business, you’ll find the right option for your trip.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thanks for your feedback. With your input, the app ALL Accor is constantly improving to offer all the functions that you expect.
Fixes to minor bugs and improved stability.
Download our new app now!

apps.title: Read-Along: Books For Kids App
apps.description:
This app is great for parents of children between the ages of 2-11 who want their children to:

1.  Get ahead in reading and learning 
2. Catch up in reading and grade-level content  

All the books have “Read It Myself” and “Read To Me” formatting.

Unlike other apps that merely entertain, this app is a tool that provides parents with a JUST RIGHT methodology and an environment to engage children in early reading and learning.

Our unique "Just Right" method and read along books offer the most authentic reading experience mimicking traditional finger tracking.


WHAT DOES THIS APP OFFER:
• A growing library with new books, flashcards added every week
• Authentic reading experience that simulates traditional finger tracking
• Professional expressive human voice narration
• More than 85% nonfiction content
• Globally relevant content

JUST RIGHT SCREEN TIME
• No distraction, free of ads, animations, videos and games.
• Offline functionality to keep kids safe from online dangers.
• Static illustrations with read-aloud audio and word highlighting
• Interactive flashcards

MOTIVATES & ENGAGES KIDS WITH
• Badges
• Rewards
• Leaderboard

ACHIEVEMENT OF LEARNING MILESTONES WITH
• Flashcards
• Singalongs
• Smart Words for vocabulary building

MONITORING OF CHILD'S ACTIVITY WITH
• Activity feed

apps.title: Summary Z-ChatBook & Summaries
apps.description:
Get ready for an extraordinary reading experience with SummaryZ! Our latest feature, ChatBook, allows you to chat with any book in the world, enhancing your learning process like never before.
Along with our daily free book summaries and audiobook summaries from the best books of 2022, you can now engage in smart conversations with your favorite books. Ask any question and get instant answers from our AI Book Assistant.

Discover your next read by browsing summaries and audiobook summaries, published by our editors, from the most popular books and the most famous authors of 2022. With ChatBook, you can now dive deeper into the content and gain new insights into the concepts presented.
Our community of writers selects the best highlights, tips, and insights from popular fiction and nonfiction books and presents them as easy-to-read or listen-to book summaries. Each summary has between 6 to 12 ideas, representing a concept from that particular book.
Enjoy book summaries from many categories such as bible studies, self-help, motivational, self-improvement, self-development, and more. And with ChatBook, your learning experience is taken to the next level. Try it out and see for yourself!
After you download the app, set up a challenge to read one book summary a day for 30 days. Reading or listening to one book summary from a book in SummaryZ takes just 10 minutes. It's easy, fun, and now with ChatBook, it's even more interactive and engaging!

Choose from 2 PRO subscriptions to level up your reading:

• $8.99 billed monthly
• $59.99 billed annually

After your FREE 3-day trial, your subscription amount will be charged to your iTunes Account. All subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Special introductory offers only apply to the first billing term.

Discover your next read by browsing summaries and audiobook summaries, published by our editors, from the most popular books and the most famous authors of 2022. With ChatBook, you can now dive deeper into the content and gain new insights into the concepts presented.
Our community of writers selects the best highlights, tips, and insights from popular fiction and nonfiction books and presents them as easy-to-read or listen-to book summaries. Each summary has between 6 to 12 ideas, representing a concept from that particular book.
Enjoy book summaries from many categories such as bible studies, self-help, motivational, self-improvement, self-development, and more. And with ChatBook, your learning experience is taken to the next level. Try it out and see for yourself!
After you download the app, set up a challenge to read one book summary a day for 30 days. Reading or listening to one book summary from a book in SummaryZ takes just 10 minutes. It's easy, fun, and now with ChatBook, it's even more interactive and engaging!

Choose from 2 PRO subscriptions to level up your reading:

• $8.99 billed monthly
• $59.99 billed annually

After your FREE 3-day trial, your subscription amount will be charged to your iTunes Account. All subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Special introductory offers only apply to the first billing term.

https://basmo.app/terms-and-conditions-summary-z/

apps.title: StoryShots: Book Summaries
apps.description:
UNLIMITED FREE BOOK SUMMARIES
Choose from 1 Million+ Book Summaries, including Bestsellers & New Releases!

WHY choose StoryShots?
* Featured #1 by Apple, The Guardian, TechCrunch & Google
* 4.7 Global Rating by 10000+ Users
* With 1 million+ book summaries we offer the largest collection of summaries worldwide!
* Crowned the BEST EDUCATION APP by TechCrunch 
* One of the world's BEST MICRO LEARNING APPs by The Guardian
* Content available in 30+ languages

1 MILLION BOOK SUMMARIES 
Nothing replaces reading a great book cover-to-cover. But who has the time? Instead, use StoryShots to learn the key insights of over 1 million+ books in minutes!

FREE AUDIO BOOKS & BOOK SUMMARIES
Enjoy the key takeaways of 400+ bestsellers for free. Access key ideas of 1 million other bestsellers and hot new releases with StoryShots AI.

MULTIMEDIA: READ, LISTEN OR LEARN VISUALLY
StoryShots is the only Microlearning app that enables you to learn key book insights with infographics, mind maps, video and animated content.

EASY READING ACROSS ALL DEVICES:
Access your favorite book summaries anywhere, anytime with seamless integration for Kindle, Kobo, and comprehensive PDF support on mobile, ebook-reader, or desktops.

KEY INSIGHTS TO GREAT BOOKS IN 15 MINUTES
Don't feel guilty about unread books gathering dust. At least learn their key ideas or review lessons in only 15 minutes. 

30+ BOOK CATEGORIES
We cover a wide range of categories: business, entrepreneurship, management, leadership, mindfulness, self-improvement, productivity, psychology, habits, health, investing, economics, marketing, sales, history, philosophy, science, happiness, dating, and relationships.

StoryShots™ IS FOR YOU IF YOU:
* want to challenge yourself to read more
* prefer visual learning, watching videos or animations
* want to be more efficient and productive by learning on the go
* get frustrated when an author repeats the same concept over and over
* need to learn the big ideas of a book before attending an event or a meeting
* boost your education level
The key ideas are our original content or curated from thousands of YouTube channels, podcasts, and blogs. We handpick so you don't have to.

ORDER THE BOOK TO LEARN MORE
Order the book or get the audiobook for free on Amazon from the app to learn more.

STORYSHOTS | BOOK SUMMARIES: 
We want to make the core lessons of the world's best books accessible to EVERYONE, regardless of their budget, time, and learning preference. 

UNLOCK THE POWER OF MICRO LEARNING TODAY and download the app now!

COPYRIGHT NOTICE
The book covers are downloaded from Amazon. StoryShots is an affiliate of Audible and Amazon. Affiliate commissions from the sale of the books support our free tier. StoryShots is an alternative to Blinkist and Scribd.

STORYSHOTS SUBSCRIPTION TERMS
StoryShots offers a free version with a monthly, annual, and one-time premium subscription for offline downloads. not displaying ads, highlighting, note-taking, etc. To get the subscription, go to the side menu and tap on Get premium benefits.

If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged an annual subscription fee according to your country. The subscription fee will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each subscription term unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the term. Subscription renewals cost the same as the original subscription, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal at any time after purchase by going to your iTunes Account Settings. Refunds will not be given for any unused portion of the term. By using the app, you agree to our Terms of Use https://www.getstoryshots.com/terms-of-use & Privacy Policy https://www.getstoryshots.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: CU-eBook Store
apps.description:
CU e-Book Store  คือ ระบบร้านหนังสือ E-Books ที่เป็นศูนย์กลางของหนังสือวิชาการ พร้อมที่จะผลักดันองค์กรความรู้ด้านวิชาการให้เปลี่ยนไปในรูปแบบหนังสือดิจิตัล
    พบกับหนังสือและนิตยสารจากสำนักพิมพ์ชั้นนำ ที่คุณสามารถเลือกซื้อและดาวน์โหลดไปอ่านใน iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch ของคุณ 

   ฟีเจอร์ CU e-Book Store
    - ระบบร้านหนังสือที่ใช้งานง่าย แบ่งเป็นหมวดหมู่, ค้นหาหนังสือด้วยเงื่อนไขต่างๆ ได้ มีหนังสือหลากหลาย
    - มีหนังสือตัวอย่าง ให้ทดลองอ่าน
    - หนังสือที่ซื้อแล้ว สามารถลบหนังสือเพื่อประหยัดพื้นที่ได้ และ download กลับมาอ่านใหม่อีกเมื่อไรก็ได้
    - ตัวอ่านหนังสือ ที่ออกแบบมาเพื่อเน้นให้ใช้อ่านได้จริง รองรับไฟล์หนังสือหลากหลาย ทั้งหนังสือที่มี Multimedia, ไฟล์หนังสือที่สามารถขยายขนาดอักษร เปลี่ยน Font 
    - ถนอมสายตา ด้วยโหมดอ่านกลางคืน/ซีเปีย /ปรับความสว่างหน้าจอ
    - จดโน้ต / วาดรูปลงในหนังสือได้
    - เปลี่ยนหน้าได้ง่ายๆ ด้วยการ Swipe หรือ Tap
    - จดจำหน้าที่อ่านค้างไว้ในแต่ละเล่มอัตโนมัติ และกลับมาอ่านต่อได้เสมอ รวมถึงเพิ่มที่คั่นหนังสือเองได้
    - สามารถรีวิว, ให้เรตติ้งหนังสือ หรือแชร์หนังสือที่ชื่นชอบไปยัง facebook ได้

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:

- remove facebook login

apps.title: Any Book - Georgian Books
apps.description: The Georgian book reader application is a digital tool designed for avid readers who prefer to read books in the Georgian language. This application offers a vast collection of e-books in different genres, including fiction, non-fiction, and educational books, which users can access from their smartphones, tablets, or computers. The app provides a user-friendly interface, making it easy for readers to browse and select books, adjust font sizes, highlight text, and add bookmarks. Additionally, the Georgian book reader application supports offline reading, allowing users to access their books even when they don't have an internet connection. Overall, this app provides an excellent platform for Georgian readers to enjoy a wide range of books and enhance their reading experience.

apps.title: RYA Books
apps.description:
We have enhanced our digital editions (where possible) to bring the content to life by embedding animations, video and interactive tools to help illustrate the key points and skills from our popular books. Download this free app to browse the eBook editions – you can also try free taster versions of many eBooks, so you can try before you buy.

These eBooks are a great resource supporting our world famous RYA Training Courses such as those within the trademark RYA Yachtmaster Scheme, the RYA Powerboat Scheme and the RYA Dinghy Sailing & Windsurfing Schemes among others. You will find eBooks of essential and recommended titles along with plenty of further reading and development, whether you’re starting to sail by taking a Competent Crew course, taking things further with a Day Skipper course or taking your RYA Yachtmaster exam – whatever you need, we’ve got it covered!

There are great examples throughout our range of our use of interactive content in areas such as seamanship, boat handling, passage planning, knots and stability but you’ll find something very special in our editions for:
• Collision Regulations – where we've developed over twenty interactive 360° lights and shapes tool to provide readers a more realistic way of viewing how vessels will actually present themselves in a wide variety of contexts, at four different times of day covering both day and night.
• VHF – where we’ve created animated examples of the voice procedures in the RYA VHF Handbook and also linked the content to sample questions to help students pass the RYA SRC exam.
• Navigation – where we’ve developed a special tool to replicate using the tidal curves in the RYA Training Almanacs to help students taking shorebased navigation courses.

Although these eBooks are designed for tablets, we’re still keeping smart phones very much in mind. This way, you’ll still be able to access the enhanced interactive content on the smaller devices even if you feel you wouldn't read a book on something so small.

There’s plenty for instructors as well with not only the interactive content, that can be used as demonstrations and enhanced learning on and off the water. There are also a whole host of useful features, (which we’re always evolving) such as bookmarking, note taking and inter-edition linking that will help you manage the content you want to support the way you teach.

This updated version of the app now includes a wider range of boating categories to make it easier for you to navigate all the new content that we are regularly adding:
• Sail
• Dinghy
• Sail Racing
• Sail Cruising
• Windsurfing
• Power
• Powerboating
• Motor Cruising
• Personal Watercraft
• Inland Waterways
