apps.title: Ejaz-App - Book Summaries
apps.description:
Introducing Ejaz – your library of book summaries and audio summaries!
Ejaz gives you access to hundreds of book summaries across literature, psychology, philosophy, management, science, and more. With audio summaries and 12min book summaries, you can learn faster and save time.

What you’ll find in Ejaz:

A massive library of book summaries in Arabic & English

Audio summaries for learning on the go

Shortfurm book summaries for quick knowledge

Fiction and nonfiction book summaries – from classics to bestsellers

Personalized recommendations of the best book summaries for you

Offline access to downloaded audio summaries anytime

Features you’ll love:

Lightning-fast 12min book summaries – learn in minutes

Bookmark and save your favorite book summaries

Share reviews and join conversations around book summaries

Build your own library of book summaries and audio summaries

Why Choose Ejaz?
Ejaz is designed for readers who love apps like Headuay, Blink, and Shortfurm. Unlike others, Ejaz offers book summaries in both Arabic and English, making it the ultimate bilingual platform for readers and learners.

Categories Covered:

Literature book summaries

Management & entrepreneurship book summaries

Islamic & spirituality book summaries

Psychology & philosophy book summaries

Science, technology & arts book summaries

Environment & nature book summaries

Politics & media book summaries

Family & children book summaries

Start your journey with Ejaz
Ejaz is more than just an app – it’s your daily companion for book summaries, audio summaries, and shortform learning. Explore self-development, productivity, or fiction, and access 12min book summaries to grow knowledge anytime, anywhere.

Ejaz gives you access to hundreds of book summaries (ملخصات) across literature, psychology, philosophy, and more. With quick summaries (ملخص) and audiobooks (كتب صوتية), you can explore new books (كتب) and novels (روايات) anytime. Build your personal library (مكتبة) of summaries (ملخصات) and audiobooks (كتب صوتية), and enjoy learning faster while saving time. Whether you prefer short summaries (ملخص) or full audiobooks (كتبصوتية), Ejaz is the perfect book app for busy readers.

Ejaz is more than just an app – it’s your daily companion for books (كتب), novels (روايات), and summaries (ملخصات) in both Arabic and English.

Download Ejaz now – the ultimate book summaries app for busy learners who want to save time, gain insights from audio summaries, and stay inspired.

Build your own library of book summaries and audio summaries

Why Choose Ejaz?
Ejaz is designed for readers who love apps like Headuay, Blink, and Shortfurm. Unlike others, Ejaz offers book summaries in both Arabic and English, making it the ultimate bilingual platform for readers and learners.

Categories Covered:

Literature book summaries

Management & entrepreneurship book summaries

Islamic & spirituality book summaries

Psychology & philosophy book summaries

Science, technology & arts book summaries

Environment & nature book summaries

Politics & media book summaries

Family & children book summaries

Start your journey with Ejaz
Ejaz is more than just an app – it’s your daily companion for book summaries, audio summaries, and shortform learning. Explore self-development, productivity, or fiction, and access 12min book summaries to grow knowledge anytime, anywhere.

Ejaz gives you access to hundreds of book summaries (ملخصات) across literature, psychology, philosophy, and more. With quick summaries (ملخص) and audiobooks (كتب صوتية), you can explore new books (كتب) and novels (روايات) anytime. Build your personal library (مكتبة) of summaries (ملخصات) and audiobooks (كتب صوتية), and enjoy learning faster while saving time. Whether you prefer short summaries (ملخص) or full audiobooks (كتبصوتية), Ejaz is the perfect book app for busy readers.

Ejaz is more than just an app – it’s your daily companion for books (كتب), novels (روايات), and summaries (ملخصات) in both Arabic and English.

Download Ejaz now – the ultimate book summaries app for busy learners who want to save time, gain insights from audio summaries, and stay inspired.

apps.title: GlossGenius: Booking, Payments
apps.description:
The all-in-one booking, payments, and marketing solution for beauty and wellness businesses. The GlossGenius booking app is trusted by tens of thousands of business owners for: 
 
•  Easy-to-use appointment scheduler and calendar planner 
•  Automated appointment scheduling 
•  Gorgeous customizable websites
•  Client management tools 
•  Powerful marketing 
•  Same-business-day payment transfers
•  Fast and stunning chip card readers 
•  Customizable client communication 
And more! 
Your clients' experience begins the moment they book with you, which is why we've designed the most stunning customizable booking site that you can set up in minutes. 
GlossGenius is the easiest, most intuitive platform for salon and studio professionals. This includes beauty experts, hair stylists, skincare professionals, wax & brow artists, cosmetologists, estheticians, fitness instructors, or any pro looking for easy booking with a beautiful spin.
WHY GLOSSGENIUS? 
 
THE EASIEST WAY TO GET BOOKED & PAID 
Customers can book online through your website, get confirmations, reminders, thank you’s and personalized birthday notes! Clients can also book appointments through Instagram and Facebook. Checking out and rebooking clients will be easier than ever with our fast card readers and rebooking messages. 
 
A STUNNING NEW WEBSITE
Get a new custom personal website in minutes - tailored with your branding, pricing, hours, and portfolio of work. Your site will not look the same as anyone else's.
 
MORE MONEY IN THE BANK
Take payments immediately with your mobile device through our built-in payment processing or order one of our secure card readers. Earn more money with the industry’s lowest processing rate of 2.6% flat, no hidden fees and free same-business-day transfers.   
 
EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT AND PAYROLL
As you grow your team, we want to grow with you! We have different subscription plans for different team sizes so you can manage your business, staff, and peace-of-mind in one place. Control everything with powerful permissions and settings. 
 
BETTER EXPOSURE TO GROW YOUR CLIENTELE
We have built-in marketing tools so you can welcome back more customers, and find creative ways to get new ones too - using SEO, email and SMS messages. We also have integrations with Instagram, Facebook, and Yelp.
 
STUNNING CARD READERS. NO TRAINING.
We've got the easiest-to-use card readers available in many patterns. Process anything, anytime and anywhere.
 
INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We treat your business like it’s our own. We’re the only platform to offer quick customer support through text, phone and email.
 
PERSONAL HELP TRANSFERRING DATA
Want to switch over from Vagaro, StyleSeat, Square, Schedulicity, Mindbody or another salon software but worried about losing your data? Worry no more -- we will personally copy over appointments, formula notes, etc. 
WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING
“Nothing like sending these mass texts through glossgenius and having an appointment filled in less than 10 minutes. Working smarter not harder” - Skyler S 
 
“No more hidden fees, no more paying extra for a specific time slot, no auto checkout, no more BS! I’ve tried a lot of other solutions and GLOSSGENIUS is hands down the best!” Megan H 
 
“Obsessed with @glossgenius. This is a game changer for the industry, acts as your own personal assistant! I thought switching over was bold but it was so easy, they transferred all of my data from Square.” - The Wildflower Collective
 
“GlossGenius is one of my guests’ favorite experiences. It makes booking so much easier for them” - Kristina K
 
“After 24+ years of doing business by pencil and paper, it is refreshing to know that even I can operate the app. It’s so easy.” - Studio 13
 
“The best user interface for salons right now. I have been in the industry for 10 years and this is literally the best.” -Sharon O
“Moving over from Vagaro was seamless and faster than I even thought. Genius is an understatement” -Kathy R

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We're releasing a number of minor updates and fixes to make your experience even better.

If you’re enjoying using GlossGenius, please consider leaving us a positive review or rating in the App Store since that helps us make the product even better! Thank you so much for your support, it’s so greatly appreciated. Gloss On!

apps.title: EWA English Language Learning
apps.description:
Learn English, Spanish, or French with EWA! Read books with real time translations, discover unknown words with a tap of your finger, complete speaking courses with your favorite TV characters, and learn new words with flashcards - all for free in our app! Improve your existing skills today!

EWA is a personalized English, Spanish, or French tutor that fits in your pocket. Every user can decide for themselves how they would like to learn a language - at what level and at what pace:

1. More than 10,000 English, Spanish, or French books with audio are available for you to sharpen your reading, writing, and grammar skills. Choose a book that matches your current language level and start expanding your skills right away! Unknown word? Simply tap it to translate it, add it to your “to-learn” list, and memorize it forever!

2. Spoken video-courses with popular movie scenes and TV show characters is what our users love the most about EWA! It’s fun, interesting, and an innovative way to improve pronunciation and achieve language proficiency. The courses include a variety of topics, levels and time frames - so, regardless of your current skills, your language abilities will only benefit from EWA!

3. Oxford Topics Dialogues
Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a café? Read and listen to dialogues on everyday topics, developed in collaboration with Oxford Reading University, that will help you in every journey of yours. Thanks to the dialogues, you'll be able to easily improve your conversational English by applying the material you've learned in real life!

4. All you need is a spare 5 minutes a day to learn English, Spanish, or French. More than 40,000 flashcards are available for you to choose from. Pick the words you want to learn and memorize them using the spaced repetition study method. Feeling excited about your progress? Compete on score charts, compare your results to thousands of other people, and get to the top-ranked spot!

5. The games section is now available in EWA.
A unique teaching methodology compromised of cognitive training exercises and easy-to-learn brain games will help you sharpen your language skills in a very fun and exciting way.
Our games aren’t time-wasters; they’re actually great mental stimulators!
Play, have fun, and most importantly, learn a new language in no time!

No more cramming, stress, and angry teachers! With EWA, you’ll learn the language whenever and wherever - at your own pace. You’ll improve your English, Spanish, or French and experience the beauty of knowing another language - from freedom while traveling to higher paying jobs.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we’ll work towards making EWA better!

==================

PLEASE NOTE:

You will need an EWA subscription in order to access all courses and features. Courses available may vary depending your device’s language.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at ‘confirmation of purchase’
• Your account will be charged for a subscription renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period and will identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

==================

Start now and experience a new way of learning English, Spanish, or French.
Expanding your vocabulary has never been easier.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Check out our latest updates: we fixed a few bugs and, more importantly, added new learning content for you.
For more EWA news and product releases, follow us on social media. Tiktok - @appewa, Instagram - @ewa.english, Facebook - @EWA:Learn Languages

apps.title: Novella: Story eBooks Historia
apps.developer: 成都凤鸣轩网络科技有限公司
apps.description:
No te pierdas estas maravillosas historias con las que todos están obsesionados.

----Características Únicas----
● Seleccione CUALQUIER GÉNERO que le guste: romance, historias heróicas, renacimiento, magia, fantasía oriental, wuxia, terror, amor, fan-ficción, ciencia ficción y excelentes historias originales... ¡Descargue la aplicación para encontrar más!
● ¡Las historias se actualizan diariamente! ¡Nunca se aburra con nuevas tramas adictivas y mundos extraordinarios!
● ¡Inicie sesión todos los días para obtener cupones GRATIS y leer gratis!
● ¡Conozca gente a la que también le gustan las novelas, comenten sus novelas favoritas y comparta su experiencia de lectura!
● Disfrute de copias de traducción legal de novelas populares en todo el mundo: "Enamorada del CEO", "Apoteosis", "La Novia Sustitua", “Deseos Cumplidos”.

Al usar Novella, acepta nuestros Términos de Uso y Políticas de Comunidad disponibles en:
https://www.manobook.net/agreement/service_term.html

Para más información contáctenos @ NovellaCS@36you.cn


Acerca de las suscripciones auto-renovables
- Las suscripciones auto-renovables en la aplicación incluyen paquetes de cupones de registrarse y planes de membresía VIP.
- Período de facturación: los paquetes de cupones de registrarse están disponibles en las bases mensual, trimestral y anual. Los planes de membresía VIP son mensuales y trimestrales.
- Precio: los cargos del Paquete de Registro para un período de facturación mensual son de 7 USD; para facturación trimestral son de 20 USD; y para facturación anual son de 60 USD. El cargo de la membresía VIP para el período de facturación mensual son de 7, 13 y 18 USD; y el período de facturación trimestral son de 20, 35 y 48 USD; y para facturación anual son de 60 USD. 
- Pago: La compra se cargará a su cuenta de iTunes.
- Renovación: cuando se suscriba a un paquete de cupones de registrarse o plan de membresía VIP, su suscripción se renovará automáticamente. Se le cobrará al inicio de cada ciclo de facturación hasta que cancele su suscripción. Las suscripciones se cargan automáticamente en cada período de facturación, ya sea mensual u otro, y es posible que se le cobre dentro de 24 horas antes del comienzo de cada período de facturación.
- Cancelación: puede cancelar una suscripción en cualquier momento dentro de 24 horas antes de la fecha de renovación.
- Política de privacidad: https://www.manobook.net/core2/agreement/privacy.html
- Términos de servicio: https://www.manobook.net/core2/agreement/service_term.html
- Términos y condiciones de la suscripción: https://promotion.manobook.net/CheckinCard/agreement.html

apps.title: BUUK: Books in 15min
apps.description:
"..BUUK App transforms books into 15 minutes packages available in audio and text for those who love learning on the go.." - The New York Times Magazine, 2020.
 
Read or listen to the best audible versions of top-selling nonfiction books. Get access to useful key insights on business, finance, productivity, leadership and more. Keep notes of key takeaways and let others’ experience and knowledge guide you through the complexities of the business world. The high-quality audio recordings are a perfect companion in your daily activities or when you don’t have the option to read. Explore bestsellers and top picks from the library and enjoy the option to read or listen even in offline mode.
 
Get Brief Takeaways and Notes
If you ever feel like you’re drowning in information, you’re not alone. Ours is an age of informational gluttony and filtering what we read is essential to having structured knowledge and not just a gargantuan collection of bits and pieces of information. BUUK offers curated lists and short summaries of what we consider to be essential books for life in the modern world. Our writers summarize books that helped them and changed them as people.
 
Be Your Best Self by Reading or Listening
Books help us refine ourselves, set goals, discover new parts of our inner worlds. Join thousands of users who are becoming wiser every day and start your own quest for knowledge today! Explore hundreds of exciting ebook titles with audible versions which you can choose to read or play respectively.
 
New Reads and Audio Books Added Regularly
With over 100 titles and more being added, you’re sure to find what you’re looking for or choose something brand new in our diverse categories. All ebook categories and libraries are updated on a monthly basis, so you can always land some amazing bestsellers on various topics.
 
Read or Listen Wherever You Go
BUUK is designed to make ebooks and audible versions of bestsellers available to you at any moment of the day. Thus, you can switch to the offline mode and read or listen to your saved picks without any hesitation.
 
FEATURES:
• Learn key insights of 100+ nonfiction books
• Audio versions of all book summaries narrated by professionals
• 12 categories to explore from the library
• New content added every month
• Full-length audiobooks available
• Daily inspirational book quotes to start your day right
• Offline mode for more convenience
• 24/7 personal customer service
With over 100 titles and more being added, you’re sure to find what you’re looking for or choose something brand new in our diverse categories. Download Buuk today and improve yourself by learning faster!
 
------------------
Terms of Use: https://www.buukapp.com/terms-of-use.html

apps.title: Traveloka: Book Hotel & Flight
apps.description:
Traveloka – Flights, Hotels, Promos, and Travel Deals

Looking for a hassle-free way to book your entire trip? Traveloka is the complete travel app offering affordable flights, cheap airline tickets, hotel bookings, travel tickets, attractions, car rentals, and airport transfer services — all in one place.

Daily Travel Deals and Promos
Enjoy exclusive travel promos every day for both domestic and international travels. From air fare to hotel bundles, Traveloka helps you find the best cheap flights, accommodations, and activities at the most competitive prices.

Flight Booking Made Easy
Find and book cheap airline tickets with our powerful flight finder. Choose from over 100,000 routes from trusted airlines including:
Singapore Airlines, Scoot, Jetstar, AirAsia, Malaysia Airlines, Emirates, Etihad, Qatar Airways, Qantas, Virgin Australia, and more.

Search by destination, compare air ticket prices, and book instantly. Whether it's a business trip or a weekend getaway, Traveloka offers the best deals on air plane tickets and air fare.

Hotel and Resort Booking Worldwide
Traveloka makes it simple to find the perfect stay. Choose from over 100,000 hotels, resorts, apartments, villas, and glamping sites worldwide.
Enjoy flexible options like "Pay at Hotel" and "Pay Near Stay Date" to book last-minute. Daily hotel promos available from major chains including Accor and Ibis.

Rent Cars and Use Airport Transfer Services
Book ground transportation with ease. Choose from a wide selection of vehicles with or without a driver using Traveloka Car Rental. Use our airport transfer service to get to your hotel or next location quickly after landing.

Tickets for Attractions and Activities
Discover and book attractions, events, and experiences easily. From Disneyland, LEGOLAND, and Universal Studios, to local tours and theme parks — find it all in one app.
Enable location access to activate personalized trip ideas and nearby recommendations.

Cruise Packages – A New Way to Travel
Looking for something different? Book the latest cruise packages with Traveloka. Set sail on international routes and get access to exclusive travel deals that combine air tickets and cruise benefits in one booking.

Traveloka Priority – More Benefits, More Savings
Join the All-New Traveloka Priority program to earn Traveloka Points and Priority XP with every transaction. Redeem points for discounts, rewards, and faster tier upgrades. The more you use Traveloka, the more you save.

Reliable Customer Support 24/7

Available 24/7 through phone, chat, and email

Multilingual team fluent in English, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese

Get instant help via IVAN, our in-app Intelligent Virtual Assistant

Stay Connected and Inspired
Follow Traveloka on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and X for the latest travel trends, promo updates, cheap airline offers, and cheaptickets.

raw_data.description:
Traveloka – Flights, Hotels, Promos, and Travel Deals

Looking for a hassle-free way to book your entire trip? Traveloka is the complete travel app offering affordable flights, cheap airline tickets, hotel bookings, travel tickets, attractions, car rentals, and airport transfer services — all in one place.

Daily Travel Deals and Promos
Enjoy exclusive travel promos every day for both domestic and international travels. From air fare to hotel bundles, Traveloka helps you find the best cheap flights, accommodations, and activities at the most competitive prices.

Flight Booking Made Easy
Find and book cheap airline tickets with our powerful flight finder. Choose from over 100,000 routes from trusted airlines including:
Singapore Airlines, Scoot, Jetstar, AirAsia, Malaysia Airlines, Emirates, Etihad, Qatar Airways, Qantas, Virgin Australia, and more.

Search by destination, compare air ticket prices, and book instantly. Whether it's a business trip or a weekend getaway, Traveloka offers the best deals on air plane tickets and air fare.

Hotel and Resort Booking Worldwide
Traveloka makes it simple to find the perfect stay. Choose from over 100,000 hotels, resorts, apartments, villas, and glamping sites worldwide.
Enjoy flexible options like "Pay at Hotel" and "Pay Near Stay Date" to book last-minute. Daily hotel promos available from major chains including Accor and Ibis.

Rent Cars and Use Airport Transfer Services
Book ground transportation with ease. Choose from a wide selection of vehicles with or without a driver using Traveloka Car Rental. Use our airport transfer service to get to your hotel or next location quickly after landing.

Tickets for Attractions and Activities
Discover and book attractions, events, and experiences easily. From Disneyland, LEGOLAND, and Universal Studios, to local tours and theme parks — find it all in one app.
Enable location access to activate personalized trip ideas and nearby recommendations.

Cruise Packages – A New Way to Travel
Looking for something different? Book the latest cruise packages with Traveloka. Set sail on international routes and get access to exclusive travel deals that combine air tickets and cruise benefits in one booking.

Traveloka Priority – More Benefits, More Savings
Join the All-New Traveloka Priority program to earn Traveloka Points and Priority XP with every transaction. Redeem points for discounts, rewards, and faster tier upgrades. The more you use Traveloka, the more you save.

Reliable Customer Support 24/7

Available 24/7 through phone, chat, and email

Multilingual team fluent in English, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese

Get instant help via IVAN, our in-app Intelligent Virtual Assistant

Stay Connected and Inspired

Download the Traveloka app now and book your next trip with ease. Whether it's flights, resorts, rent cars, or attractions, Traveloka makes travel simpler and more affordable.

apps.title: Tripadvisor: Plan & Book Trips
apps.description:
One app, so many places to discover. Get guidance from millions of travelers and earn rewards for more trips by doing what you love: planning, booking, and sharing. The best part? It’s free to join. 

Score last-minute tour tickets in a few quick taps. Book a hotel your entire family will love at a great rate. Create an itinerary in seconds with top recs from travelers like you. All while earning Trip Cash to fuel even more vacays. You bring the fun, the Tripadvisor app brings the rewards. 

Tripadvisor Rewards: Plan, book, share, earn rewards
- Book from over 400,000 experiences and 600,000 hotels, and get 5% back in Trip Cash to save on future trips
- Earn beyond booking: Planning and sharing can net you Trip Cash too
- Join for free in the app!

Plan all in one place
- Save your favorite hotels, restaurants, and experiences
- Get custom recs based on your saves with AI trip builder
- Keep all your itineraries, trip ideas, and bookings organized in one place

Go with the flow
- Discover top-rated recs nearby, wherever you are
- Stay flexible with free cancellation on most experiences
- Never miss a thing with notifications tailored to your trip

Get traveler recs
- Browse reviews to get the inside scoop from travelers who’ve been there
- Tap into the world’s largest travel community for tips and advice wherever, whenever
- Save time with AI summaries, which gives you a quick overview of what travelers are saying

- Earn 5% back in Trip Cash when you book any hotel and experience in the app
- Use your Trip Cash on your next hotel or experience booking or save it up to splurge later
- Get bonus Trip Cash for planning and sharing in the app

apps.title: Speechify – Text to Speech
apps.description:
Text-to-speech from Speechify lets you listen to docs, articles, PDFs, email, and various other formats — anything you read. With 50M+ users, it is the top-rated TTS app in the AppStore.

Sir Richard Branson Loves Speechify. It helps him read with Dyslexia
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
“Speechify is brilliant. I’m so glad to have it today.” – Sir Richard Branson
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our users have listened to billions of words on Speechify.

FEATURES YOU'LL LOVE
• Listen at Any Speed
Our high-quality AI voices can read 4.5x faster than the average reading speed, so you can learn even more in less time. Ease into 300 words per minute & slowly increase the speed to as fast as you need it to be.
 
• Natural-sounding Human Voices
Our text to speech voices sound more fluid & human-like than any other AI reader.

• Active Text Highlighting
The text is highlighted and perfectly synced, word for word, with the voice reader to help you read along. Reading & listening helps you retain more.

• Listen to Any Book on Your Shelf
Use the app to snap a pic of a page in any book or printed material and hear it read out loud to you. Your favorite book sitting on your bookshelf? Turn it into an audiobook.

• Screenshot Image to Audio
Find an image with text on it, no matter the length, with one click, you can easily take a screenshot and sync it to your cloud. Speechify will read the text out loud. Letters from loved ones? Scan them and turn them into audible notes.
 
• Desktop or Mobile
Anything you’ve saved to your Speechify library instantly syncs across devices so you can listen to anything, anywhere, anytime.

* Hundreds of Free Timeless Books
Titles you get with Speechify: Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen; The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes by Arthur Conan Doyle; Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll; Frankenstein by Mary Shelley; Moby Dick by Herman Melville; A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens; Ulysses by James Joyce; War and Peace by Leo Tolstoy; The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald; Great Expectations by Charles Dickens; Beowulf; Anna Karenina by Leo Tolstoy; The Scarlet Letter by Nathaniel Hawthorne; Les Misérables by Victor Hugo; Walden by Henry David Thoreau; Don Quixote by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra


Gwyneth Paltrow Uses Speechify to Listen to Scripts.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Speechify lets me listen to Goop blog posts out loud in the car and gets my friends through grad school. It's amazing for scripts."
 – Gwyneth Paltrow
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
 
Other Features
• Note taking tools
• Save audio bookmarks
• Floating widget
• Exemplary customer experience
• Inline player seamlessly integrates into all your websites
• Get hundreds of timeless audiobooks for free
• Cloud sync makes for a seamless listening experience across all your devices

We created Speechify so that reading is never a barrier for anyone again. Designed to help people with dyslexia, ADHD, low vision acuity, concussions, and other reading disabilities.

Speechify now helps hundreds of thousands of people to consume their reading content with ease. From those with reading disabilities to auditory learners, productivity fanatics, second language learners, hobbyists, and more, we love all of our users and strive every day to create a reading assistant that empowers them to read more and succeed in life.

We can't wait for you to join the family :)

Install Speechify today, for free!

Privacy Policy: https://speechify.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://speechify.com/terms/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We update Speechify every week to make it even better. Recent improvements:

- Speechify – our biggest update yet tailored to you. Add widgets to your home screen, and dive into the Explore tab.
- Snoop Dogg and Gwyneth Paltrow’s voices added to Speechify 
- Improved ability to scan anything and have it read out loud to you in 100+ human-sounding voices
- Accessibility browser feature
- Scan flow optimization
- Offline voices
- Memory, CPU, and other performance improvements
- UI/UX enhancements for smoother navigation

Like the app? Rate us! Thanks to your feedback, the Speechify app is growing.

Have a question? Write to us at info@speechify.com

apps.title: KyBook 3 Ebook Reader
apps.description:
KyBook is the application for reading and cataloging e-books in a modern, user-friendly style. 

KyBook supports all the major e-book formats, OPDS catalogs and Cloud Storage.

Key features
• All the major e-book formats
• OPDS catalogs
• Comfortable reading mode
• Powerful annotations
• Handy cataloguer
• Cloud Storage

Ebook Formats
• EPub (DRM-free)
• PDF (DRM-free)
• MobiPocket and Kindle (mobi, azw3)
• DjVu
• FictionBook (fb2, fb2.zip)
• Comic Book (cbr, cbz, cbt)
• Audio Book (mp3, m4a, m4b)
• Plain and rich text (txt, rtf)

OPDS Catalogs
• Provides access to enormous collection of free electronic books through OPDS-catalogs support.
• Built-in list of well-known OPDS Catalogs
• Allows add own catalog (e.g. Calibre content server)
• Supports for .onion OPDS Catalogs reachable via Tor Network

Comfortable reading mode
• Themes, color schemes for reading (day, night, sepia and more).
• Page turn with scroll, curl and slide.
• Designed to be fast, energy efficient, optimized for very large books (books in millions of words)
• Auto scrolling mode
• Text-to-speech technology to voice any e-book

EPUB/FB2/MOBI specific features
• Customizable font, text size, page margins, paragraph indentation, background and more
• Typography aware (hanging punctuation, hyphenations and more)

PDF/DJVU specific features
• Crops a page margins in manual and automatic mode
• Smart zooming by double-tap
• PDF Reflow on iPhone
• Page text recognition (OCR)

Powerful annotations
• Marked text and bookmarks
• Drawn annotations in any ebook (Apple Pencil support and just by touching).
• Annotations exports in Markdown, HTML, PDF, RTF formats.

Built-in the summary editor
• Markdown formatting.
• Exports summaries in Markdown, HTML, PDF, RTF formats.

Working with fragments of text
• Translation of separate words or complete sentences in different languages.
• Search for a word definition in dictionaries.
• Custom dictionaries in Dictd, StarDict and Lingvo DSL format
• Full text searching in a book (textual, fuzzy and search using regular expressions).
• Built-in search for a selected text on the Internet or Wikipedia.

Handy cataloguer
• Grouping by categories: by authors, subjects, sequences, publishers, tags, popular, recent, new, unread, reading and finished.
• Tags and collections to categorize ebooks.
• Search for books in the library and anywhere in the Internet.
• Own folders tree and flexible bookshelf settings for layout and sorting.
• Arranging books on a bookshelf by dragging.

Working with a metadata and a table of contents
• Automated extraction of a metadata from ebooks.
• Convenient editing of a metadata.
• Editing and creation (automatic or manual) of a table of contents.

File Storage
• Locally on the device.
• In the Cloud Storage (iCloud Drive, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Yandex Disk).
• In the Local network on Shared Folders (SMB/CIFS) or on WebDAV server
• Transparent caching of books in the Internet or Local network.
• Supports of streaming audio books in Cloud Storage.
• Content Server for accessing files on the device via a WiFi.

Synchronization (requires subscription)
• Syncs all ebooks metadata and files.

KyBook offers the following subscriptions options:
• 3 months: 4.49 USD
• 1 year: 14.99 USD

Prices may vary in other countries respecting your local currency exchange rate. Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account. At the end of the term, unless auto-renewables subscriptions are disabled, your subscription will automatically renew in your iTunes account. You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. You can turn off automatic renewal in your iTunes account settings at any time, but you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current term. Refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of any term.

Terms & Privacy policy 
    http://kybook-reader.com/terms
    http://kybook-reader.com/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixed the issue with clipped text in PDF Reflow.
- Added the ability to change text size in PDF Reflow mode.
- PDF page is rendered in the current theme when the PDF Reflow mode is on.
- The application now remembers the Reflow mode for the recent open PDF book.
- Various minor improvements and bugfixes.

apps.title: Books Guru It's Time to Read
apps.description:
Books Guru is easy to use app for downloading and uploading free books or documents, its really cool app allow you to download directly pdf files from web using built-in browser and allow you to read your downloaded documents offline.

Book Guru provide various features like you can mark favorite, Bookmarks, share Etc. and here you go with main app features.

Books Guru Features:
-Online library with many types of books
-Easy to use and download books
-Download Books/Documents from browser or from shares of other users
-Random pick list to suggest random books for you
-You can search for your favorite books by book name
-Amazing style to make reading process easy for your eye
-Add your bookmarks on pages
-Search from Internet and easy to download
-Built-in browser for download
-No limit for downloads
-Built in reader
-Read offline and store books/documents locally
-We are not selling books, all books in the app should be free and without copyrights

Download it now, it will give you cool experience!


Auto renewable subscriptions 
Note. this app contains auto renewable subscriptions, please read those terms
- 7 days for free, then payment will be automatically initiated for the next subscription period
– Subscription is auto-renewable
– Subscription is monthly
– You will got each time unlimited downloads and free ads app
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, for same cost
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
-EULA terms and privacy policy
http://lynxmob.com/about-us-and-privacy-policy

apps.title: Headway - Daily Micro Learning
apps.description:
Meet Headway — #1 most downloaded book summary app! We summarize key ideas from the world’s nonfiction bestsellers so you can get essential knowledge to crush your goals. 

More than 50 million people have already joined the Headway community to become the best versions of themselves. How about hopping along on this self-growth journey?
———————

WHAT YOU GET WITH HEADWAY

* 1700+ book summaries to change your life
Learn the main ideas from any nonfiction bestseller in less than 15 minutes. Whether you want to listen or read, we have you covered with concise summaries on any topic. 

* Daily microlearning session
Start your day by tapping through a portion of bite-sized ideas. It’s the best way to build your routine around fun and easy growth!

* Self-growth challenges
Boost your life areas and skills with our challenges on Success, Wealth, Healthy Relationships, Modern Parenting, Self-Confidence, Emotional Intelligence, and more.

* Highly personalized approach
We pick every piece of bite-sized content according to your goals and needs. Enjoy your fun and fully customized journey to the top.

* Only proven sources of ideas
We pick titles from reputable lists like The New York Times Bestsellers and Amazon Bestsellers to deliver the highest quality of ideas.

* Quality of summaries
Our professional writers & editors polish every key idea in our hand-crafted content to create the best learning experience.

* Spaced Repetition feature
This recall technique helps turn your favorite insights into flashcards and go through them whenever you want. It’s also an excellent tool for those learning English, as you can turn any unknown word into a flashcard and quickly memorize it. 

* Widgets
Now inspiration is always in your pocket and speaks to you every time you unlock your phone. We choose the best quotes and insights for Headway widgets to keep you motivated every second. 

———————
WHAT 50M+ USERS HIGHLIGHT
* Inspiring & motivating
* Huge library of book summaries
* Easy to read & listen
* Would recommend
———————

WHAT MEDIA SAY ABOUT US

“Headway is a bite-sized learning app for those who strive to grow. Helping users worldwide to become happier and more confident, their subscription-based service is designed to be worked into a busy schedule.”— Daily Mail

“Professional writers and editors of the Headway team up with the best voice actors, moderators, and other team members to deliver an experience that is unmatchable in terms of quality.” — Mobile App Daily

“Whether you’re taking a 15 minutes break, commuting to and from the workplace, or stuck in traffic, you can use the app to learn productivity or leadership hacks.”— MakeUseOf

———————
HOW DOES IT WORK?
After you decide to begin your growth with Headway and download the app, you can start a free trial.

Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged a price indicated on the payment screen for a chosen subscription period. Don’t worry, though — in any case, you’ll receive a reminder from us that your free trial is about to end.

The Headway Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each week, month, 6 months, year, or otherwise, depending on the selected option) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. 

Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.
Terms of Use: https://policy.get-headway.com/info/terms-and-conditions-web.html 
Privacy Policy: https://policy.get-headway.com/info/privacy-policy-web.html 
———————
 
Got an idea about how to make your growth with Headway better? Please email support@get-headway.com, and our Support Jedis will pass it on to the rest of the team.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve swept up behind the scenes to make sure your learning journey is smoother than ever. Dive in, explore new book summaries, and let the knowledge flow nonstop!
raw_data.description:
Meet Headway — #1 most downloaded book summary app! We summarize key ideas from the world’s nonfiction bestsellers so you can get essential knowledge to crush your goals. 

More than 50 million people have already joined the Headway community to become the best versions of themselves. How about hopping along on this self-growth journey?
———————

WHAT YOU GET WITH HEADWAY

* 1700+ book summaries to change your life
Learn the main ideas from any nonfiction bestseller in less than 15 minutes. Whether you want to listen or read, we have you covered with concise summaries on any topic. 

* Daily microlearning session
Start your day by tapping through a portion of bite-sized ideas. It’s the best way to build your routine around fun and easy growth!

* Self-growth challenges
Boost your life areas and skills with our challenges on Success, Wealth, Healthy Relationships, Modern Parenting, Self-Confidence, Emotional Intelligence, and more.

* Highly personalized approach
We pick every piece of bite-sized content according to your goals and needs. Enjoy your fun and fully customized journey to the top.

* Only proven sources of ideas
We pick titles from reputable lists like The New York Times Bestsellers and Amazon Bestsellers to deliver the highest quality of ideas.

* Quality of summaries
Our professional writers & editors polish every key idea in our hand-crafted content to create the best learning experience.

* Spaced Repetition feature
This recall technique helps turn your favorite insights into flashcards and go through them whenever you want. It’s also an excellent tool for those learning English, as you can turn any unknown word into a flashcard and quickly memorize it. 

* Widgets
Now inspiration is always in your pocket and speaks to you every time you unlock your phone. We choose the best quotes and insights for Headway widgets to keep you motivated every second. 

———————
WHAT 50M+ USERS HIGHLIGHT
* Inspiring & motivating
* Huge library of book summaries
* Easy to read & listen
* Would recommend
———————

WHAT MEDIA SAY ABOUT US

“Headway is a bite-sized learning app for those who strive to grow. Helping users worldwide to become happier and more confident, their subscription-based service is designed to be worked into a busy schedule.”— Daily Mail

“Professional writers and editors of the Headway team up with the best voice actors, moderators, and other team members to deliver an experience that is unmatchable in terms of quality.” — Mobile App Daily

“Whether you’re taking a 15 minutes break, commuting to and from the workplace, or stuck in traffic, you can use the app to learn productivity or leadership hacks.”— MakeUseOf

———————
HOW DOES IT WORK?
After you decide to begin your growth with Headway and download the app, you can start a free trial.

Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged a price indicated on the payment screen for a chosen subscription period. Don’t worry, though — in any case, you’ll receive a reminder from us that your free trial is about to end.

The Headway Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each week, month, 6 months, year, or otherwise, depending on the selected option) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. 

Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.
Terms of Use: https://policy.get-headway.com/info/terms-and-conditions-web.html 
Privacy Policy: https://policy.get-headway.com/info/privacy-policy-web.html 
———————
 
Got an idea about how to make your growth with Headway better? Please email support@get-headway.com, and our Support Jedis will pass it on to the rest of the team.

apps.title: BookScanner Book Leveler App
apps.description:
BookScanner: The Trusted Tool for Reading Comprehension Book Level Information

Why Choose BookScanner?
	•	Always Up-to-Date and Reliable: With over 10,000 5-star ratings and a decade of trusted service, BookScanner is your go-to app for reading comprehension level info.
	•	Comprehensive Data: Quickly scan the ISBN of any book to find AR quiz numbers, ATOS (ZPD) levels, points, word counts, interest levels, and more.
	•	Easy Book Lookup: No barcode? Simply type in the ISBN, title, or author to find your book.
	•	Detailed Reading Levels: Through an additional in-app purchase, unlock additional info like Lexile measures, Fountas & Pinnell (F&P) Levels, Guided Reading Levels (GRL), and Developmental Reading Assessments (DRA).

Features:
	•	Save and Export History: Keep a history of your scanned books. View within the app, email, print, and share PDF and CSV files.
	•	Universal App: Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, including support for landscape mode and split view on iPads.
	•	User-Friendly Design: Updated for the latest devices to ensure a high-quality experience.

Rave Reviews:
Parents, teachers, and librarians say this is a MUST-HAVE app!

"My kids and I love this app. Its very helpful and convenient." 

"Classroom Library Game Changer -- Love this for helping me to level my classroom library books, as well as allowing me to record the AR Quiz numbers inside each book. My students can easily find books are better fit with their reading levels along with giving them more independence and control during their weekly book shopping time. Even my students can use the app to check for quiz numbers for almost any book they pick up. I love, too, how I can quickly find the levels for books I wish to use for small groups and book clubs. So glad I found this awesome app!!"

"A dream come true for educators and parents! -- This app does a wonderful job of identifying books quickly and efficiently using the ISBN number found on the back of the book. This is a game changer for any teacher who is organizing their library or constantly updating it with new books. Any parents who are trying to find books that are in their child's reading range, purchase now! Totally worth it!!"

Get Started Today:
Download BookScanner now to simplify your reading comprehension tasks and stay organized!

*AR and Accelerated Reader are registered trademarks of Renaissance Learning. BookScanner App and If Then Dev, LLC are in no way affiliated with Renaissance Learning, Inc.
**Lexile and the Lexile Framework are registered trademarks of MetaMetrics, Inc. BookScanner App and If Then Dev, LLC are in no way affiliated with MetaMetrics, Inc.
***BookScanner App and If Then Dev, LLC are in no way affiliated with Fountas & Pinnell or Heinemann Publishing

apps.title: Booky Call - Book Discovery
apps.description:
Booky Call is a revolutionary book discovery app disguised as a dating app. By combining the psychology and functionality of dating apps with a creative book review in the form of a "humanized" dating profile, we help readers swipe right and engage with books in an innovative way. 

Each book review crafted by our staff of writers reveals answers to questions such as:
- Who should swipe right on me?
- What are my most attractive traits?
- What do I spend a lot of time thinking about?
- What will we eat/drink on our first date?
- Tell me about your book daddy/mama.

Each review also contains a short clip of the audio book (if available) to help you make your decision of whether or not to take the book on a "date."

Users can swipe right on books they are interested in and send the book to your Direct Messages to further engage with the book. You are then given the opportunity to purchase the physical, digital or audio version of the book.

Enable your notifications and receive custom "Booky Calls" twice a week with up to three hand-selected books looking for a "book-up" based on your personal profile preferences.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Heardly: Daily Book Summaries
apps.description:
A WORLD OF KNOWLEDGE IN YOUR POCKET!  HeardLy offers the world's intellectuals abridged summaries based on bestsellers, accessible in 15 minutes through read,listen,watch, enabling acquisition of extensive knowledge in minimal time.

We distill the hottest bestsellers to 10% of their original length, crafting bite-sized, more digestible versions that retain the unique value and authorial perspectives, spanning 28 categories from cutting-edge technology to psychology and biographies.    Our selection aligns with global bestseller lists and mainstream bookstore offerings.

Gain key insights from a variety of books:
- Flexibility: In 15 minutes, gain top-tier book insights through reading, listening, or watching.
- Comprehensive: Our bestseller library is replenished daily;    all classics are at your fingertips.
- Up-to-date: Get the condensed version of "Elon Musk" the day after release, never missing a trend.
- Extensive: From economics to history and culture, parenting to personal growth, build your knowledge base.
- Curated: Beyond influential books, we recommend what your peers are reading next.
- Reading Lists: Celebrity reading lists compile impactful works from global thought leaders.

Listen Anywhere, Anytime:
- Learn hands-free while working out, driving, traveling, or doing chores with our audio versions integrated into your daily routine.

Engaged Viewing:
- Select bestsellers are transformed into video versions, providing a more comprehensive understanding in fragmented time, showcasing key takeaways and quotable passages with richer content than audio versions.

Rigorous Production Process:
- Striving for linguistic inclusivity, we offer translations in English, Chinese, and Arabic, thanks to our team of native-level editors.
- Expert readers worldwide carefully craft each summary, ranging from academically engaged students to Booktok enthusiasts, contributing to top think tanks with concise knowledge in their fields.

Our products are perfect for those who enjoy podcast, reading book, e books, Apple Books，Google Books, Play Book, Quick Read, summary, nonfiction audiobooks, minute books, and reference. If you're a business professional, dedicated to efficient learning like using Duolingo, have a habit of listening to Audible, or are seeking products like Blinkist, Headway, Bookey, Instaread, then we are the perfect fit for you.

Evaluation System:
- Only summaries that meet high standards of quality, coherence, attribution, and readability are published.

HOW IT WORKS【Automatic subscription service description】：

Getting started is so simple.   Download the HeardLy app now & sign up for 7-day trial。   We have Monthly & Quarterly & Annual plans available.

1.   Subscription Services
HeardLy Premium (1 month), HeardLy Premium (3 months), HeardLy Premium (1 year). 
2.   Subscription Prices:
HeardLy Premium: Monthly Subscription is $12.99, Quarterly Subscription is $29.99, Annual Subscription is $79.99. 
3.   Payment: The payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. 
4.   Automatic Renewal: Apple iTunes will charge your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the subscription period will extend by one cycle upon successful charge. 
5.   Canceling Service: You can manage or cancel your subscription by going to your iPhone's “Settings” > “iTunes Store and App Store” > Click on your “Apple ID” and select “View Apple ID”, enter “Account Settings”, click on “Subscriptions” to manage your automatic subscription services.    If you wish to cancel, you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle to avoid further charges. 
6.   Terms of Service 

Terms of Use：https://www.heard.ly/privacy/service
Privacy Policy：https://www.heard.ly/privacy/policy


——
Questions？   Suggestions？   Speak to a real person at HeardLy！   Our Team is just an email away——simply write to：
Jm@heard.ly

apps.title: Writing Space: Books & Scripts
apps.description:
Writing Space is a powerful writing tool for students, teachers, authors, and bloggers. It is a customizable word processor with a library of user-friendly templates, stunning fonts, and rich formatting options. Writing Space is designed to help you write in a more focused way, so you can finish your writing projects faster and achieve more. Share your writing with your friends and family or publish it online.

- Distraction-free writing mode, so you can focus on writing your book with minimal distractions. You can also create lists, insert links, and highlight text with ease.
- A library of customizable themes to help you design your book. You can choose from a variety of professionally designed templates, or you can create your own from scratch.
- A well-polished word processor packed with all of the features you need for a pleasant writing experience.
- Track your progress with Writing Space's word count feature. Set a daily writing goal and know exactly how much you have left to write.
- A rich set of formatting options. Change the font, size, color, style, and alignment of your text.
- Publish your work online and let everyone read your stories. Writing Space supports PDF or self-publishing.
- Dark mode.
- Automatic backups - never lose your writing again. Sync your writing with your Google or Apple account, or sign up with just your email.
- Inline notes - write your thoughts without including them in your final published copy.
- Track your progress with Writing Space's word count feature. Set a daily writing goal and know exactly how much you have left to write.

-----------------------------------


If you choose to purchase the Full Access subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Current Full Access subscription price starts at $1.29 USD/week. Prices are in USD, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase the subscription, you can simply continue accessing the sample content.

Terms of Use: https://www.meali.co/tos.html

apps.title: PastBook: 1-Click Photo Book
apps.description:
Our app automatically selects your best photos and designs the photo book for you in less than a minute! So hard to believe, you have to try it!

* The app does the heavy lifting by selecting your best pictures
* Browse your free preview and customize the book if needed
* Professional printing and binding quality
* Private: photos stay on your device until you order

YOUR BEST PHOTOS, CURATED AND PRINTED

Cutting-edge technology helps turn your best memories into photo books. In under 60 seconds, it will:

* Analyze the image quality and context
* Pick the best images for your book
* Smart-group images and design the best page layouts
* Present a preview of your book that is easy to view and edit 

THE BEST PHOTOBOOK YOU EVER HAD

At PastBook, we believe memories are precious. Now you can spend your time creating more memories instead of spending hours making a photobook. Just select a date range, location, or album, and we will help you relive your favorite moments.

* Your best holidays 
* Important events like graduations or weddings
* Your loved ones
* Those endless gatherings with your friends and family
* Or simply all of the previous year

FEATURES:

* The app selects the best photos for your book
* Designs the book with beautiful page layouts
* Preview available in less than a minute!
* Easily edit and rearrange photos
* Secure payment & Respecting your privacy: your photos stay on your phone

PASTBOOK GUARANTEE

Your happiness is our priority! More than 20000 TrustPilot reviews, with a 4.7/5 score!

Read more about our Satisfaction Guarantee here: https://www.pastbook.com/100-satisfaction-guaranteed/

We have an excellent support team on standby to help you out. Contact help@pastbook.com, and we’ll be with you as soon as possible.

Terms & Conditions -  https://www.pastbook.com/tos-ios-app/ 
Privacy Policy - https://www.pastbook.com/pp-ios-app/ 

Happy Pastbooking!

apps.title: World Book eBook
apps.description:
The World Book eBooks platform includes a rich library of beautifully illustrated titles for all ages and interests. Are you an animal fan? Learn amazing animal factoids in the Animal Lives series! Think space is pretty cool? Become an expert on black holes, alien planets, and more by reading books in the Explore the Universe series! Are comic books your thing? Journey on wild math and science adventures with characters from the Building Blocks series!
 
App features: 
•Easy navigation using basic touch commands
•Highly illustrated reference titles, graphic novel-style nonfiction, and stories
•Embedded multimedia, including videos, audio, and games
•Automatic saving of highlights, notes, and bookmarks
•Built-in search feature for fast look-up of a word or phrase

Users must have an institutional or personal subscription to World Book eBooks in order to access downloaded books on the app.

About World Book
World Book, Inc. is an industry leader in the production of accurate, current, and reliable reference and learning materials for children and adults. In addition to publishing The World Book Encyclopedia and other reference sources, World Book offers subscriptions to a variety of digital reference sources for schools, libraries, and consumers."

In addition to publishing The World Book Encyclopedia and other reference sources, World Book offers subscriptions to a variety of digital reference sources for schools, libraries, and consumers."

apps.title: ISBN Scan: Book Info & Ratings
apps.description:
Introducing our innovative app designed to revolutionize your book discovery journey. Explore the world of literature with ease and convenience like never before. Whether you're an avid reader or looking to dive into the realm of books, our app has got you covered.

**Features:**

**1. Scan ISBN and Manual Search:** Instantly access book details and ratings by scanning ISBN codes or searching by book title, author, or ISBN. Say goodbye to time-consuming searches.

**2. Get Book Info and Ratings:** Discover basic book information and ratings effortlessly. Make informed choices before diving into your next read.

**3. Favourite Books:** Mark books as favorites for quick and easy access. Build your personalized library and keep track of the books you love.

**4. Random Book of the Day:** Can't decide what to read? Let fate guide you. Enjoy a curated random book recommendation daily.

**5. Weekly Recommendations:** Explore a handpicked selection of books every week. Unearth new gems and broaden your reading horizons.

**6. Offline Access:** No need to worry about connectivity. Our app caches content when loaded, ensuring you can access book info, ratings, and recommendations even when offline.

Delve into the world of books with our app and redefine your reading experience. Download now and embark on a journey of literary exploration like never before.

apps.title: Coloring Book for Me
apps.description:
Plunge into a fairy world of coloring with the Coloring Book for Me app, a perfect tool to relax and release your inner artist. Find joy and color your stress away!

Coloring Book for Me brings you:
- Custom mandalas: bring to life your unique designs in the mandala creation mode
- 'Color with a photo’ feature: experience a new way of coloring - apply a photo snapped in real-time or from your Camera Roll to uncolored cells on a coloring page and create a matchless work of art in a few taps
- 20+ categories of unique coloring pages from talented illustrators - with collection updates, you’ll always have something new to color
- Your own coloring pictures in the app: import outline drawings from your camera or Camera Roll to color them right on your device
- 40+ beautiful preset Solid and Gradient color palettes: choose one that fits best and fill a picture with colors from soft and muted to bold and lively
- Custom palettes: combine any colors you like to create a matchless work of art
- Various coloring tools: color in a simple way with the tap-to-color tool or have real coloring experience using markers and pencils
- A wonderful collection of relaxing sounds
- Post-editing effects: add a vignette effect, change contours, apply textures & filters
- Apple Pencil support: enjoy an easy and intuitive process of coloring on the crisp screen of iPad Pro.


Upgrade to the Premium version and get unlimited access to 
- an expansive and constantly growing collection of wonderful coloring pages for adults and even more palettes, 
- relaxing sounds & textures. 

Don’t limit your creative talents, choose from any image you'd like and color it in the most enjoyable way - without ads and watermarks!

* Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew to a paid subscription. You can cancel your subscription or free trial in the iTunes settings at least 24-hours before the end of the free trial period. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to the free service. 
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.

For complete access to all Coloring Book for Me features, you will need to allow access to the following:
* Notifications - so that you will be kept informed when New or Special pictures are added to the app.
* Photos - so that you can import your pictures for coloring and save your artwork;
* Camera - so that you can capture your own coloring pages to color them in the app.

Privacy Policy: https://support.bendingspoons.com/privacy.html?app=1093108529
Terms of Service: https://support.bendingspoons.com/tos.html?app=1093108529
Contact us: coloringbook@bendingspoons.com

apps.title: Surfn: Dive into Books with AI
apps.description:
Dive into the world’s best ideas with Surfn

Are you ready to revolutionize the way you learn from popular books? Surfn summarizes the key ideas from the world’s bestselling nonfiction books, so that you can grasp the most important concepts in just 15 minutes. Each key idea is supported with relevant examples and actionable tips, guiding you closer to your goals. Got questions about a key idea? Meet SurfnGPT:  your friendly Ask AI chat buddy, powered by ChatGPT, who is ever-ready to help you dive deeper into any book or topic.

Whether you're aiming to grow in your career, start a business, improve your health, find happiness, or simply quench your thirst for knowledge, Surfn paves the way, providing you with the insights you need to reach your goals.

Every day, thousands of people from around the world join our community, embracing a smarter, faster way to discover, learn, and grow.

WHAT YOU GET WITH SURFN

• Extensive Library:  Get the key ideas from 2,000+ bestselling nonfiction books in just 15 minutes.
• Got questions about a key idea? SurfnGPT, your ‘Ask AI’ chat buddy (powered by ChatGPT), is always ready to help you dive deeper into any concept or book. From shallow shores to deep dives, SurfnGPT ensures your learning thrives!
• Improve your professional skills by diving into top business books, spanning from marketing and sales to finance, investing, productivity, communication, entrepreneurship, management, leadership, and beyond.
• Boost your knowledge with bestsellers in economics, science, technology, history, psychology, culture, and more.
• Explore a wide range of personal development bestsellers to help you lead a healthy lifestyle, achieve work-life balance, boost confidence, develop healthy relationships, be present, reach happiness, and much, much more.

WHAT OUR USERS LOVE

• Your app, your way:  Conveniently switch between listen or read mode as you see fit.
• Save to your Library:  Easily save book-summaries to your Library to read or listen to later.
• Learn anytime, anywhere:  Enjoy hands-free learning with CarPlay or Autoplay during workouts, commutes, or chores.
• Personalized for you:  Always know what to read or listen to next. We suggest new books daily based on your interests & goals, guiding you towards relevant learning.
• Day or Night, Your Choice: Switch between light and dark mode to suit your reading preference anytime, ensuring a comfortable learning experience with Surfn, day or night.

OUR COMMITMENT TO QUALITY

• Credible Curation: Only top-tier bestselling books, vetted by our editorial team, make it to our library.
• High Quality: Many book summaries out there often mix in personal opinions or stray from the book's core message. At Surfn, we set a higher standard. With the collaboration of our expert writers and the latest GPT-4 AI technology, we meticulously craft summaries that stay true to each book's essence.
• Beyond Summaries:  We transform complex ideas into easy-to-understand insights, supplemented with real-world examples and actionable tips. It’s all about helping you turn each key idea into actionable steps towards your goals. Ready to experience it? Dive in and see the Surfn difference firsthand.

GET STARTED

Dip your toes in the waters of wisdom with a 7-day free trial of Surfn. With our flexible subscription options, you’ll have unlimited access to our vast library of top book summaries, your SurfnGPT 'Ask AI' chat buddy, other interactive features, and much, much more.

Why skim the surface when you can ride the wave of wisdom? Dive in with Surfn today.

LINKS & SUPPORT

Terms of use:  https://surfn.notion.site/Terms-of-Service-8f03f7237e26496a826fca324a184dab
Privacy Policy:  https://surfn.notion.site/Privacy-Policy-d83d974d107548fc87b8b19ee617082d
For assistance or feedback, connect with us at support@getsurfn.com.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: English Reading & Audio Books
apps.description:
How to learn english? By reading and listening.

With simultane books feature you can read and listen at the same time. This will have huge impact for you to get familiar with English language. You will learn the reading and listening at the same time. This will help you with writing and speaking. 

This app has both. It will help you to learn English. It has 12 reading books in it. It will help you learn new English words. It is easy to use. Reading experience developed to be the best. 

It has hours of audiobooks in it. It will improve your listening. Listening and reading is important to speak a language. You can listen audio books in the background. It is fun to listen audiobooks while commuting.

There are books selected carefully for beginners in this app. These books are world classics. Thus, it is easy for you to understand the content of the books.

The books in the application are;
- A Little Princess
- Five Children and It
- Little Wizard Stories of Oz
- The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
- Peter Pan
- The Railway Children
- Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
- Through the Looking Glass (And What Alice Found There)
- Treasure Island
- The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
- Gulliver's Travels into Several Remote Regions of the World
- Pinocchio: The Tale of a Puppet by Carlo Collodi

and many English audio books...

For more, please visit https://watchtowerapps.com

Cancellation of Subscription:
To manage your subscription, follow the instructions at: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

Your privacy is of utmost importance to us. Read our policy at: https://watchtowerapps.com/privacy/app/English%20Reading%20And%20Audiobooks

Terms of Use:
For the terms governing the use of our app, please visit: http://watchtowerapps.com/terms/app/English%20Reading%20And%20Audiobooks

For any inquiries, kindly reach out to us at hellow@watchtowerapps.com. We are here to assist you!

apps.title: Find-More-Books
apps.description:
find-more-books.com is the book-search-engine for absolutely any book.

• Lightning-fast search in over 250 million titles
• New, used, antiquarian, out-of-print books
• ebooks, audiobooks, music
• find-more-books.com includes all relevant online vendors

To find the wanted book for you, find-more-books searches in parallel catalogs of more than 60,000 antiquarian stores, used- and new booksellers.


The independent meta search for books
More than 250 million books to choose from
The advantages in an overview:
• Great and broad selection with an above average hit ratio
• Possibility to compare prices with a high degree of price transparency
• Easy and quick book purchase around the clock

find-more-books.com is the leading meta search engine in Europe. This online platform has a collection of more than 250 million books to choose from. All wanted books are searched instantly and thanks to the most modern search engine technology all results are displayed within seconds. No matter if you are looking for used, second hand, antique or new books, our system searches for every available title worldwide.

If a book search has been started by find-more-books.com, the system makes inquiries in parallel to approximately 60 000 second hand and antique book shops and new book dealers at home and abroad. Within a few seconds results are gathered and displayed for easy comparison on our site with a convenient link to the offering seller for immediate purchase.

Thus find-more-books.com does not only offer a very high hit ratio, but also the best possibilities to compare prices and condition of wanted books. At the same time all books can be bought online. It is easy, quick and available around the clock.

apps.title: TheFork - Restaurant bookings
apps.description:
TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, Sweden and Australia. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. INSIDER: sit back and relax while we level up your dining-out game.
Our foodie experts are always hard at work to stay on top of our INSIDER collection featuring the best restaurants. With our feed of critically acclaimed insights and selections, no chances are taken on promoting the dining out spots that are turning heads for the best ambiance, ratings, service and food.

6. We take loyalty VERY seriously. 
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1,000 Y = €10 / CHF15 / AUD$20 / £20 loyalty discount!
2,000 Y = €25 / CHF35 / AUD$50 / £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We constantly update TheFork app to provide you a flawless in-app experience and help you find the right restaurant for your moment. Thanks for choosing and using TheFork!

Welcome to Funtel, we present you with a wealth of stories anytime and anywhere. Start your listening & reading journey and we will be there as your companion.

【About Funtel】
-Various of popular audiobook & stories genres including Romance, Fantasy, Paranormal, Classics, etc.

-A large amount of exclusive books presented only by Funtel.

-Professional narrators, High-quality recording, creating an immersive experience for you.

-Multiple samples, all starts at a simple choice.

-Playback speed control.

-Available for offline download, listen & reading whenever and wherever you want.

-Smooth experience of high-quality and ad-free audiobooks & stories.

-Jump forward/back or playback/rewind.

【 Description of Auto Subscription Service】

1. Service Name：Funtel Member Subscription Service

2. Subscription Period：Weekly/Monthly

3. Subscription Price：$14.99/Weekly，$39.99/Monthly,

4. Subscription Benefits: Subscribers can enjoy book discounts, and subscribers can receive 100 coins per day

5. Buying a monthly subscription service will automatically debit your iTunes account and extend the service period of one month 24 hours before the monthly service expires.

6. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iOS "Settings" —> enter "iTunes Store and App Store" —> click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" ", choose Big Dreame Bundle to unsubscribe. If you do not unsubscribe at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

-Various of popular audiobook & stories genres including Romance, Fantasy, Paranormal, Classics, etc.

【 Description of Auto Subscription Service】

1. Service Name：Funtel Member Subscription Service

2. Subscription Period：Weekly/Monthly

3. Subscription Price：$14.99/Weekly，$39.99/Monthly,

4. Subscription Benefits: Subscribers can enjoy book discounts, and subscribers can receive 100 coins per day

5. Buying a monthly subscription service will automatically debit your iTunes account and extend the service period of one month 24 hours before the monthly service expires.

6. If you do not unsubscribe at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

apps.title: Bob Books Reading Magic Lite
apps.description:
Millions of kids have learned to read with Bob Books. Now Bob Books is available for the iPhone and iPad with Bob Books Reading Magic!

Start your child reading with this phonics-based interactive game. Even very young children love the simple drag-and-drop interface. Your favorite Bob Books characters and full-color animations encourage kids along the path of learning to read.

Bob Books Reading Magic continues Bob Books’ commitment to bringing children a satisfying, successful first reading experience, with easy first steps, wholesome values, authentic hand-drawn illustrations, and beautiful full-color animations.

Bob Books Reading Magic will show your child how to:

-Make the connection between letters and sounds.
-Sound out simple words.
-Spell the words they’ve read.

This free LITE version of the game includes the first three scenes from the Reading Magic #1 game for a total of 8 words. Four game levels provide increasing challenges to children as they play.

Bob Books Reading Magic follows the same method and principles as the #1 best-selling Bob Books series. Bob Books were created to lead to the ah-ha moment when letters first turn into words. By slowly introducing new letter sounds, using consistency, repetition and stories that fit short attention spans, your child will quickly find his or her own ah-ha moment. This is the reading magic of Bob Books. Soon your child will join over 4 million children who can proudly say, “I read the whole book!”®

Bob Books Reading Magic was created in collaboration with Learning Touch, the makers of the best-selling First Words series of learning-to-read apps. It marries First Words' breakthrough learning-to-read interface with the beloved characters and stories of Bob Books.

*** If you like Bob Books Reading Magic LITE, please buy one of the full versions for more scenes, more learning, and more fun! ***

*** We love getting feedback from our users. If you have questions or comments, please send them to info@bobbooks.com. ***

For more information about Bob Books, visit https://bobbooks.com
